Antibody - Avoid Barney's angry attacks as long as you can. Take Over - pay attention to shiny spots popping up on the field’s walls. If you bump into them, they will turn into your very own spikes! Every game mode features a power-up that can give you an edge against your opponents. Wait for the power-up timer to fill up and… fire! No friends coming over? No worries! The single player mode will keep you hooked for hours!

name: Get 10 Quest
summary: 80 levels, 6 different gameplay and the original endless mode.

name: Genkai Tokki: Seven Pirates - Premium Edition
Get Over Blood
summary: In this game your main aim is to climb up to the top of a tower. To do this, you should use a blood rope.

name: Gears of War 3: Forces of Nature
summary:
Forces of Nature is a DLC installment for Gears of War 3 that was released on March 27, 2012 for 800 Microsoft Points.

Based around weather and natural disasters, the Forces of Nature DLC packs five more maps, four additional characters, seven new weapon skin sets, and the introduction of "Elemental Cleavers"; Easter-egg weapons that are hidden on Horde playthroughs on Forces maps that each have a different elemental property. Finally, after examining community feedback, a classic Gears of War 2-era gametype, Guardian, is making a comeback.

name: Gethaut
summary: The cyberpunk shooter with horror elements. The plot tells about fight of military corporations and opposition of cars and demons.

name: Generation Zero: Fnix Rising
summary: The struggle for survival continues as the year 1989 draws to a close. Hope for finding the missing population has started to dwindle, as you and your friends continue to do your best to stay away from the invading machines and scour abandoned buildings for weapons and equipment. However, recent scouting missions that you have conducted on your own and with friends have yielded some unexpected results - structures that appear to be made by the FNIX machines have started appearing along the Southern Coast of mainland Östertörn. Thankfully it seems that there are also survivors, scattered across both the Southern Coast, the Archipelago and Farmland regions, putting up resistance against the invaders.

name: Geometry Rocket
summary: Race against time, defeat the enemy and collect energy. In geometry rocket you need to be fast and accurate if you want to be the best in a battle against yourself.

name: Gear Stalker
summary: VR post apocalyptic giant robot hunting game

name: Gecko Gods
summary: Explore a mysterious island as a tiny lizard. Complete ancient puzzles, effortlessly climb cliffs, and eat bugs as you make your way across an island civilization lost to time.

name: Generals. Positional Warfare
summary: Try yourself in the role of General. Make decisions in my hardcore turn-based strategy game with simultaneous moves. You can only guess what the enemy will do.

name: Get a Life
summary:
In "Get a Life" you embody Alexander Zemlinsky, a subway technician suffering from leukaemia.

Alex is not, unlike the protagonists in most games, an invincible super-soldier. But you wouldn't call him normal either, because there is something in his past that connects him with the events that are about to happen in the course of the story (we want to keep the suspense, so nothing more on that...). "Get a Life" will feature different environment settings presented in more than 24 maps, all of them connected to the scenario of the mod. GaL will offer about 11 hours of pure gameplay pleasure.

name: Geometry Arena
summary: A free-form arena-shooter Roguelite with heavy emphasis on building an overpowered character! You play as a little shape that shoots other shapes! Strengthen your character by mixing and matching mods and upgrades, and experiment with a limitless rune upgrade system!

name: Get Packed: Fully Loaded
summary: Get Packed: Fully Loaded is the expanded edition of the couch co-op removals game that’s full of calamity and physics-based carnage for 1-4 players.

name: Genetic Fluff
summary: Genetic Fluff is a Action RPG creature collection adventure game with local multiplayer support for up to 4 players. Genetic Fluff has auto-saved RPG stages, creatures, plots, experience, and quests, mixed with rogue-lite items and loot.

name: Generation Ship
summary: You're the AI, responsible for a generation ship, mankind's last hope for survival. Build efficient raw material cycles and help your crew to survive a long journey in a realistic real-time simulation and find a new home for the human race.

name: Genius At Work!
summary: Test your intelligence and creativity! With Genius At Work you will have your construction area where you can let your imagination fly and carry out your technical projects.

name: Get Mushi Club: Minna no Konchuu Daizukan
summary:
Get Mushi Club: Minna no Konchuu Daizukan is an adventure game for Game Boy Color, released by Jaleco on 1999.

A game for collecting insects in which the main character is brought to another world by a fairy and ends up catching 200 different insects in order to return to the original world. Use a magnifying glass to search the map or the destination screen to catch insects. Insects live in different places depending on the species, and the insects that appear are real.

Time passes all the time during a game, and for every second that passes, one minute of in-game time passes. The day in the game also starts at 7:00 AM and ends at 9:00 PM, so there are 14 hours of activity per day. Each day in the game changes over time, which can change the insects you catch. Other in-game times can be advanced by fiddling with the clock on the screen.

Insects collected during the game may be viewed from the game title or from an illustrated book during the game. The total number of insects featured is 310, and sampling 200 of these insects is the ending. The collected insects can also be exchanged with other players via a link cable. At the beginning of the game, players are told that they have to catch 200 different insects in 30 days, but even after 30 days, no penalty such as game over is imposed.

The game cartridge is a vibrating cartridge equipped with a vibration function, and by setting AAA batteries in the cartridge, it will vibrate when an insect is caught, etc. Also included in the game software was an appendix 昆虫図鑑ミニブック( Insect Pictorial Book Minibook), which contained information on insects appearing in the game.

name: Gems of Magic: Father's Day
summary: Remove all obstacles and reunite father and son in 100 challenging levels! In this exciting and adventurous match-3 based puzzle game you will have lots of fun!

name: Genesis Alpha One: Deluxe Edition
summary: Hyperjump into the dark recesses of space with Genesis Alpha One Deluxe Edition - where you must build, maintain and navigate your ship through a galaxy filled with hostile alien and human threats. Explore, create and survive the militarized space race in order to secure humanity's future.

name: Geadows
summary: Another bad dream? Another bad memory? Fight against your past, defeat hundreds of robots sent by GEA, the artificial intelligence that stole everything from you and condemn you to your present. Welcome to Geadows, a third person shooter roguelike. Do you accept the challenge?

name: Gelldonia
summary: Gelldonia is a world full of secrets and dangers. You, armed with a musket and a saber, must face them. Travel, gather resources, craft items, trade and fight for glory and fame.

name: Gemini Strategy Origin
summary: The Gemini Strategy: Origin is the work of TSM series. This game still adopts the way of strategy. You can get free DLC which from the publisher to active more adult content .

name: Geekwords: Game of Words
summary: Crossword puzzles with trivia from a popular fantasy tv series.

name: Gerrymander Madness
summary: Gerrymander Madness places gamers into a fictional North Carolina legislator's office and allows them to manipulate the districts of a state map to gain political advantage for a chosen party.

name: Gearshifters
summary: Steer, drift, spin, smash and gun through waves of enemy vehicles. Go to war against extreme machine bosses. Build up and tune your tactical loadout of car mods, defences and weaponry for each treacherous transport mission. Drive. Destroy. Get Paid. Upgrade!

name: Geometric Sniper: Blood in Paris
summary: Katy, a French sniper, needs to protect her magnificent city! A 2D sniper game like you've never seen! In this spin-off of the Geometric Sniper the missions are more and more challenging, you will not have a second chance. Accuracy is everything!

name: Gearshifters: Collector's Edition
summary:
Steer, drift, spin, smash and gun through waves of enemy vehicles. Go to war against extreme machine bosses. Build up and tune your tactical loadout of car mods, defences and weaponry for each treacherous transport mission. Drive. Destroy. Get Paid. Upgrade!

The Collector's Edition includes:
- Game: Gearshifters
- Clothing Patch
- Soundtrack
- 4 x Art Cards

name: Genfanad
summary: An Indie MMORPG inspired by classic MMOs and smashing tropes together.

name: Geisterland
summary: Geisterland is a dark adventure game that takes place in a fantastic universe and talks about societal problems in a creative way. It talks about empathy and fairness... and if we might let them go to survive. Will you give up your principles to survive?

name: Get Out! Snakes!
summary: Inspired by the success of the 90s, Get out! Snakes! Make the famous Snake from old cell phones your enemy, save your friends green apples in 5 different worlds, or lute against a friend in the multiplayer arena! Ah! And don't take your eyes off the snake, after all, you're also hunting now!

name: Geometrix
summary: Geometrix is a puzzle-platformer. You play as one of four geometric shapes to make your way through the level. Each form has it's own abilities and restrictions. There are restrictions for each level, such as a limited number of color-switches or form-switches.

name: Gears Triple Bundle
summary: Squad up for Gears 5, Gears Tactics and the Gears 5: Hivebusters expansion. From the early days of the Locust war to the jungles of the Galangi islands, experience the pivotal moments in the wars to save Sera. This bundle is optimized for Xbox Series X|S.

name: Get Out...
summary: As you are the Bad Father who killed his daughter, you must to get out of your home, Before you die...

name: Gefragt Gejagt
summary: In Gefragt Gejagt, players have the opportunity to test their knowledge. Team up with friends to compete about the title of the smartest person. Be the hunter or become the hunted.

name: Get Out!
summary: A 2D noir, point and click game where you uncover clues and solve puzzles in a world of espionage and international intrigue.

name: Geometric Sniper Z
summary: A 2D sniper game with zombies like you've never seen! Get ready to blow some heads and good hunting!

name: Gelly Break Deluxe
summary: Gelly Break Deluxe is a couch co-op platformer in which you, as Gel and Lee, have to save the Gellies' home planet from Evil Blob. As a team, use your shooting and switching skills in challenging jump'n'run passages to survive together against the ever-changing enemy types.

name: Gemstone Legends
summary:
Gemstone Legends is an RPG game with Puzzle elements. Set in a fantasy climate, it is based on collecting and improving Heroes. An extensive inventory system, a huge pool of diverse characters and an extensive special skills system allow everyone to match the team to their play style.
Gemstone Legends offers the opportunity to unite in the Guild and fight powerful Beasts together, while arena battles allow players to take on the road to prestigious rankings.

name: Genry's parables: Scientist Story
summary: Genry's parables: Scientist Story is a Half-Life 2 mod that tells the incredible story of Genry Freedom.

name: Get Stuffed!
summary: Get Stuffed! is a chaotic online party game where you and your friends play as plush toys battling inside an arena that you construct in real time. Capture the alarm clock needed to wake from the nightmare and then fight off your friends while the dream collapses around you.

name: Gears of War: Ultimate Edition - Deluxe Version
summary: Includes base game, Deluxe Weapon Skin Pack and Aaron Griffin multiplayer character.

name: Generation Zero: Resistance Bundle
summary: Generation Zero - Resistance Bundle contains the base game as well as the Alpine Unrest and FNIX Rising expansions, allowing you to experience all the events of the machine invasion up to this point. Discover other survivors as you take on a new tier of enemies, discovering both new havens and foreign structures that don’t bode well.

name: Generation Zero: Alpine Unrest
summary: You've discovered an unexplored island off the east coast which holds more answers, deadlier machines, new weapons, and perhaps something even more valuable - other survivors. It's time to visit Himfjäll, this former ski resort that now hold the only hideout for those trying to stave off the enemies attacks.

name: Generation Zero: Story Bundle
summary: Generation Zero - Story Bundle contains both of the story based expansions for Generation Zero, Alpine Unrest and FNIX Rising. Meet other survivors as you take on a new tier of enemies, discovering both new havens and foreign structures that don't bode well.

name: Geo-Duck
summary: The rhythm platformer that anyone would have come up with. Featuring a dynamically generated glitch-hop soundtrack. Journey to Nirvana to discover the true meaning of your existence. Traverse 49 Pythonesque levels. You'll never hear the same game twice.

name: Get Lost in Nature With Luke
summary: America's East Coast is home to some of the most beautiful canyons, beaches, mountains, gorges, mountains, and rivers. It is especially famous during the Fall, when the leaves turn to impossibly beautiful shades of red, orange and yellow. This experience will allow you to visit some of these beautiful locations, hear a guided narration, and get up and even walk about a bit! At a time when travel, especially international travel, is so hard, we want to make you feel truly transported. We want you to feel the vitality, the rawness of these beautiful places in the same way you'd feel if you were visiting these places for the first time. New places will be added frequently, even extending outside the United States. Come and be part of this exciting journey with us!

name: Geogames
summary:
Website that offers some games based on the Google Street View API.
The main game mode is the City Meetup where two people lost in a city need to meet each other only using voice communication.
Other game modes are under development.

name: Gebockers
summary: 3D versus action game exclusivity on Sega Saturn.

name: Gemstone Defense
summary: A casual single player maze-based tower defense game. Build the best maze and discover the strongest towers, if you can.

name: Get it, Hero!
summary: A game based on the traditional sport "Capture the Flag" but with one however, both are composed of heroes who will compete between who is the fastest, most stealthy, or simply who shoots the best enemy to pass. Be the Hero and take the flag, working as a team or not

name: Gentle Club
summary: Gentle Club is a fighting simulator inspired by Hollywood movies, distinguished by the choreographed stunts the players perform while fighting in dynamic and destructible environments.

name: Gear Tunnel
summary: Moving all the time is your only chance to survive. How long can you move?

name: Gesuido
summary: A turn-based traditional roguelike with Macintosh-style graphics in which a debt-stricken protagonist gets rich and collects mysterious gems that occur in the abandoned sewers of Tokyo.

name: GeometryBricks
summary: It's a puzzle game with a small amount of arcade elements. In the game, a player controls two heroes both at the same time. In some levels heroes move opposite to each other. The game consists of 35 levels with lots of different mechanics. The game will be available on PC and mobile.

name: Genkai Tokki: Castle Panzers - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Genkai Tokki: Castle Panzers
Booklet
Drama CD
Soundtrack CD

name: General War Memories
summary: "General War Memories" is a 2.5D style MMO. It allows players to be involved in the endless battle of World War II and allows players to truly feel the scene of World War II.

name: Genesis Noir: The Cosmic Collection
summary:
The Cosmic Collection includes:
- The noir adventure Genesis Noir and all its available digital extras
- The original soundtrack
- A digital art book "An Act of Creation"
- The interactive comic "Moiré Noir"

name: Get to Work, Succubus-Chan!
summary: Enter your own erotic dream and play this shoot-em up where you can customize your attacks.

name: GeneRacing
summary: Ein Top-Down Arcade Racing Game - with TrackEditor, League System, Steamintegration, Controllersupport, etc.

name: Generation Nova
summary: Manage a colony of people who woke too soon from their cryo-sleep. Build and manage a working generation ship and hopefully one day the grandchildren of the first generation might land on a habitable planet.

name: General Population
summary: Experience the brutality of prison life in this first-person RPG. Survive as an inmate amidst the violence and politics of the penal system or enforce the rules as a corrections officer. Tattoo and craft, or bribe and murder your way to the top. But remember, your reputation is everything.

name: Get Tanked!
summary: Why settle for regular tanks when you can drive a super tank? Forget about physics laws and challenge your friends in dynamic and rule-free clashes on one of many exciting arenas. Wishlist now and Get Tanked! in multiplayer combat arena.

name: Gene Rain: Wind Tower - Sky City's Rebirth
summary: "Sky City Rebirth" tells that Alex has fallen into an endless space after boarding the Sky City. The battle is endless, and the enemy's level will be higher and higher. You can get powerful weapons here. Every time you challenge through the reincarnation, you will Get a generous reward.

name: Gene Rain: Wind Tower - Way to Heaven
summary: ‘Way To Heaven’ tells the story of the Human rebels army opening the passage to the Sky City. The new chapter tells Alex about the adventures in Oil City, and you will face new giant boss and new enemies.

name: Generation Zero: Apparel Crafting
summary: It’s time to turn your ultimate 80s outfits into battle worthy garments with the addition of the Apparel Crafting in this latest update. By exploring and scavenging in Östertörn and Himfjäll, you will be able to find crafting materials or objects you can strip down for parts. Use these resources to enhance your clothing, making them as strong as they are fashionable.

name: Germany at War: Soviet Dawn
summary: Germany At War: Soviet Dawn is a turn-based operational wargame, with a strong historical focus. You command either the German forces through a branching historical campaign covering the entire 1941 campaign as well as part of the 1942 one or the Soviets from 1941 to the revenge of 1944/45.

name: Gedel Escape
summary: Survival game in a space setting with resource manager elements and puzzles

name: Genius Greedy Mouse: Greedy of XOR
summary: 16 new big levels with pure puzzle mazes, all heavy inspirated from the original XOR classic.

name: GeoBingo.io
summary: A free multiplayer Street View bingo game. Find words on Street View and have fun playing against your friends or alone with multiplayer and single player.

name: Gear.Club Unlimited 2: Definitive Edition
summary: Drive legendary vehicles in a huge environment with rich & diverse landscapes with remastered graphics for an enhanced experience! Manage your garage and make it your space! Admire your collection of racing cars acquired along your races. Gear Club Unlimited 2 offers more than 50 licensed vehicles from some of the world’s most prestigious manufacturers.

name: Gear.Club Unlimited 2: Ultimate Edition
summary: Drive legendary vehicles in a huge environment with rich & diverse landscapes with remastered graphics for an enhanced experience! Manage your garage and make it your space! Admire your collection of racing cars acquired along your races. Gear Club Unlimited 2 offers more than 50 licensed vehicles from some of the world’s most prestigious manufacturers.

name: Gehinnom
summary: Gehinnom is a multiplayer horror game for 1-4 players. (Demo is single-player only). Collect clues and complete quests to perform a ritual and banish the demon that hunts you. Everything in Gehinnom is randomly generated, so you will always be scared.

name: Get in the Car, Loser!: Battle on the Big Boardwalk
summary: Take a break from adventure and relax on the beach in BATTLE ON THE BIG BOARDWALK — an all new story chapter featuring 15 new endgame items, an all new sword to rival the Sword of Fate, our hardest boss yet, and most importantly... beach outfits for everyone you can use at any time.

name: Gex the Gecko in Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: This is a mod which changes Sonic to Gex the Gecko, with gameplay from its first game, including wall climbing.

name: Gewevo: Interstellar
summary: Gewevo : Interstallar is a space strategy game derived from the tabletop RPG universe Gewevo. It offers an approach a little closer to a wargame with regard to the empire management aspect. Made with passion by a one-man team;)

name: Geometric Sniper: Card Game
summary: Have you ever seen a roguelike sniper card game? Not! We didn't know any of them either, so we turned our favorite sniper game into one! Get ready to find cards and hunt your targets armed with the deck you've built! Overcome the challenges and make the right choices to save the day!

name: Genius Killer
summary:
Genius Killer - The first sandbox for the ios mobile platform. Turn imagination and build the various mechanisms to kill enemies. The unique technology allows the game to create any vehicles using a variety of designer units.
Explore the unusual world. Look for intricate structures and mystical architectural landmarks.

name: Gem Shoot
summary:
"Gem Shoot" is special type of match 3 game.
Unlike others match 3 game, you cannot more the gem. There is a gem on the bottom, you can select one of the path the shoot out the gem.
Any 3 or more gem linked together the gems will be destroyed. More than 3 gems link together, it will form a new type special gem.
"Gem Shoot" is combination game of match 3 and bubble shoot. It will provide you an other type of experience.

name: Get Stuffed!
summary: Get Stuffed! is an Asymmetrical Multiplayer Social Horror Deceit game. Up to 16 players try to kill, deceive or escape as one of three role categories (Killer, Antagonist, or Victim). Each role has a unique way of winning.

name: Gedaria
summary: Action 2D adventure game Solve puzzles using your legendary rake Rake leaves, form piles or destroy leaf-barrier Blow leaves away with wind or leaf blower, escape quicksand leaves, build your path with leaves and save the family

name: GearHead Caramel
summary: GearHead Caramel is the third game in the GearHead series. Your character can play through a series of adventures set in various times and places in the GearHead universe. Currently there are two adventure modules, with more to follow.

name: Genius Loci
summary: A short game about passing time and architectural memories.

name: Gem Setter
summary: A block sliding puzzle game with gems, ice, and a level editor!

name: Gentlemen of Fortune: Maelstrom
summary: GOF Maelstrom

name: Generic nonbinary game
summary: Are you one of THEM?

name: Gender Quest
summary: A bitsy game about questioning your gender

name: General Room
summary: No tactics required, just those pesky units off the board!

name: Gender Dysphoria
summary: A short 20 minute non-linear narrative game about negative experiences after coming out as transgender.

name: Gensou Shoujo Taisen
summary:
The Super Robot Wars-inspired Touhou Project crossover Gensou Shoujo Wars first launched on PC in 2010 and is now releasing on Nintendo Switch in 2021.

The game, fusion of bullet hell and strategy RPG, “depicts a Gensokyo epic of overwhelming scale, including the bonds between characters, and a thorough arrangement of character backgrounds and stories from their original works.” It features over 70 playable characters, as well as “impactful battle animations, dialogue scenes the fans want to see, cut-ins for every character, different theme songs for each character, and a variety of songs to match the scenario.”

name: Gebo
summary: Gebo is a first-person game where you play as Alexis, a human stuck in a dreamlike world together with a disembodied voice that calls themselves Selene. Explore the temple, solve puzzles and do your best to find a way out, even if everything isn’t what they seem to be.

name: Geki Atsu!! Pachige Damashii Vol.2: Evangelion - Shinjitsu no Tsubasa
Gender Lab Escape Simulator 2030
summary: can you escape . the Gender Lab,,,,? if you dare....

name: George
summary: George is a first person, survival horror game set in the Cascade Mountains of the United States. Using first person combat and exploration, the player must face the horrors that hide in these woods and find a way to survive the nightmare.

name: Get Help
summary: Explore the life of a teenager struggling with the everyday tasks of society.

name: General Mayhem
summary: Assasinate the enemy general. With cards!

name: George and the Printer
summary: Help George to fix his deadly printer !

name: Get_the_Key
summary: A game about beating cute monsters and "get the key".

name: Gedda Cake
summary: Gedda Cake is a 2D action-platformer about Dragons and Cakes. Play as 6 characters with unique skills and play-styles, swap between them on the fly, battle dangerous foes and explore the vast sugar-coated lands of Sugria. Help them reclaim their invaded world and get The Cake!

name: GeaSaga
summary: "Your journey into the land of Cirhena awaits!"

name: Get Off My Planet
summary: Fend off annoying humans from invading your quiet planet

name: Get Rich!
summary: Push the buttons! Kill the people! Get the money! Get Rich!

name: Gemina Umbra
summary: Gemina Umbra is an interactive narrative game. The spirits are watching.

name: Get Comfortable
summary: Take over the bed, and if our hands touch... maybe that's wonderful

name: Genpei Ryouran Emaki: Gikei
summary:
The latest historical adaptation from Inre, focusing on the late Heian period.

Protagonist Kanou Yoshitsune is the son of Kanou shrine keeper's family.
He is going to a school with other two. One is his sister Roko, and the other is childhood friend Shizuka.

They go to Kyoto with school trip, but Roko goes missing in Kuramadera. Yoshitsune and Shizuka goes to Kuramadera to find her, but they loses consciousness in the main hall. When they woke up, they were still in Kuramadera but something was different.

They were in Heian period, which is about 850 years ago.

name: Gear of Glass: Eolarn's war
summary: A visual novel with elements of romance for both sexes, telling about children who escaped to the street from an orphanage. Will they be able to survive if they are needed by a secret organization as cannon fodder?

name: Geopolitics
summary: Casual turn-based wargame

name: GearHead: Arena
summary: Roguelike mecha RPG with procedurally generated story.

name: Genrou
summary:
Set in the year 1179. The protagonist, Saya, is a 12 year old girl who lives in a small village. Having lost her mother to disease, the young girl lives her days alone working for the head of the village. From a young age, she has the ability to see through lies, possessing what is called “Heaven’s Eye”. One day, a magnificent troop visited her home, and a young man kneeled before her respectfully, saying,

“I have come to retrieve you, M’lady.”

A new world she has never seen before, and coming to meet the entourage led by Minamoto no Yoshitsune. As the era moves towards the “Genpei War” that the land of Japan becomes involved in, Saya has yet to know this at the time….

name: Geflect
summary: Geflect - move, dodge, defend and attack with one button!

name: Getting It Up
summary: An open world action / comedy variety game with a unique blend of 2D and 3D game modes. With Multi-player PvE, open world racing, combat based 2D platforming and tons of quirky humor.

name: Genre Hopper
summary: The constantly changing genre is out of control!

name: GearHead 2
summary: Giant robot roguelike in space.

name: Genpei Kassen
summary: Genpei Kassen is a historical simulation game which focuses on the war between the Genji (Minamoto clan) and the Heike (Taira clan) at the end of Japan's Heian period (12th century).

name: Gender Euphoria VN
summary: Experience a day filled with euphoric interactions and moments.

name: Get the Fluff Out
summary: Race to the exit before the cave in! Every fluff for themselves!

name: Get Witchy
summary: Fly on your broom and collect some candy!

name: Genjitsukai
summary: Genjitsukai is KagiProjects entry for NaNoRenO2017

name: Gender Prison
summary: A games jam production about the nature of gender binaries.

name: Gems n' Ropes
summary: License/explained source code available

name: Get In Shape
summary: Multi-tasking chaos!

name: GeometricMadness
summary: JUMP your way past NASTY OBSTACLES in an old fashioned, MODERN FUELED endless runner!

name: Gently Down the Marsh
summary: Row row row your boat

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter
summary: When the snow stops falling, the small Danish village of Tinglev will no longer be the same. Walk the path of Gerda as her quiet life is turned upside down during the World War 2 occupation of her home. Choose where to go, how to act, and who to trust in this intimate narrative RPG-lite experience inspired by real life events. How far would you go to protect your loved ones?

name: Get Acc_E55
summary:
Isometric puzzle adventure with the mechanics of room rotation, room escape

Now the near future, cyberpunk, and you are a local geek. Not a scientist or a genius, but a very talented inventor. For the past few years, you have been living in a rented workshop next door to a bar. The bartender is your good friend and soul mate, however it was his idea with an auction and with a very dubious lot "time machine", yes. In general, now she is in the garage, and not a little effort has already been spent on her, but, most importantly, this is the new T9 string engine. It remains to collect it, well, and a couple of little things ... Well? To the cause!

Get aCC_e55 - isometric puzzle quest with the mechanics of rotating rooms. You have to open what is closed, correct what is broken, find a way out of the rooms and solve various kinds of tasks and puzzles.

name: Genzee NFT Game
summary: Genzee is a collection of 10,001 unique collectibles living in the Ethereum blockchain. Can your Genzee make it through to the end?

name: Geography Quiz Festival: Guess the Countries
summary: Advance through our beloved game by completing the different missions you find on your way. Prove that you know the most about Geography!

name: Get to the Top: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
Gekko: Episode of Minato
summary: On the stage where swords, machines and ponytails appear in modern society A school romantic comedy visual novel where you can enjoy exciting and exciting love patterns This is the first in the moonlight series. A cool and stoic girl in this work, You can enjoy Minato's love story.

name: Gem Raider 2
summary: Gem Raider 2 is an old-school move-and-shoot game. Your objective in each room is to destroy all of the Power Gems and return to the teleport pad to exit. Other Gems can also be destroyed to increase your score. There are 20 rooms and each of the 9 types of enemy Gems has unique weapons or skills.

name: Gem Rifts
summary: Ancient portals have been lying dormant, waiting for daring adventurers to travel between worlds. Your task is to lead an expedition through one of these portals, research and build defenses around it, and protect it from hostile guardian life forms.

name: Get Achievements for Achievements
summary: The main goal of this game is to get achievements.

name: George: A Horror Story
summary: While out on a relaxing hike in the woods, George loses his bearing and finds himself lost in the mountains. He now has one goal. Finding a way back to civilization and safety, and escaping the dangers of these lands.

name: Generic RPG Idle
summary: An idle RPG where your loot matters. Optimize your equipment, defeat mighty foes, perform dark rituals and enjoy a medieval tale of revenge in a twisted version of Brazil. Elite enemies challenge how optimized your build is while random-free combat ensures attacks never miss.

name: Generations of Destruction
summary: Generations of Destruction is a simple rougelite horizontal shoot’em up with short play sessions. Get more powerful as you play through each randomly generated level. A prefect game for when you only have a few minutes to play.

name: Gem Worlds
summary: Gem World is a roguelike-puzzle hybrid. Explore 100 levels in 10 unique worlds. Dodge boulders, collect gems, fight (or avoid) monsters. Unlock and upgrade more than 20 diverse skills across multiple runs. Exploit obstacles like mines, teleporters, and more. Turn-based and easy to play.

name: Gettysburg: Fields of Valor
summary: An advanced historical war game that simulates the pivotal three-day battle at Gettysburg during the American Civil War. The game models every brigade, battery, and leader who participated in the largest battle ever fought on the North American continent.

name: Geo Zombies
summary: We find ourselves in a city infested with zombies. Our goal is to kill the zombies that come upon us and get the highest score. You can survive longer by getting bonuses that will increase your health in some parts of the map.

name: Geep Simulator
summary: The Geep Simulator game, better known as Final Drive, was a Gorillaz 3D flash and shockwave-based simulator game available on the Gorillaz.com website, at Kong Studios' carpark, during Phase 1 and also included on the Celebrity Take Down DVD, where you could drive the Gorillaz' Geep on a (somewhat limited) open 3D area. The player controls the Gorillaz' Geep with the arrow and R keys and space bar on their keyboard.

name: GeoChatter
summary: A way to play GeoGuessr and similar games with viewers!

name: Geographical Adventures
summary: Geographical Adventures is a geography game where you fly around a miniature version of the world and deliver packages to various places.

name: Get Ride! AM Driver: Soukoku no Shinjitsu
summary: Get Ride! AM Driver: Soukoku no Shinjitsu - is a 3D strategic action game that combines the strategic elements of simulation with real-time actionability. It follows the contents of TV anime AM Driver, and the characters of Get Ride! AM Driver: Shutsugeki! Battle Party - also appear.

name: Get Those Bugs
summary:
Get Those Bugs is a tower defense focused on card combos, mechanical synergies, and a limited tower count.

Command your party of magical soldiers in their mission to exterminate the invading bug forces before they destroy the powerful and mysterious artefacts.

Strategize using simplified card based gameplay to create units powerful enough to take out thousands of enemies.

name: Get Off My Space!
summary: Get Off My Space! is a tower defense game where you rely on skillful tower placement and resource management to beat upcoming dangers of the galaxy. Combining strategy and micro managing fire groups you will overcome the hardest level objectives.

name: Gensokyo Odyssey
summary: A satirical visual novel/RPG with live action parts and a script both written by a madman.

name: Gehena
summary: Gehena is a single-player first-person horror game. The only way out of the cursed town is to make the right choice and not get caught in the fog. Is what you see real or is your mind playing tricks on you?

name: G.E.T.
summary: G.E.T. (Gather, Explore, Technologize) is a 3D first person open world adventure-survival game. On your journey you will progress through different ages, beginning from the stone age and finishing in the far future.

name: Gear.Club Stradale
summary: Gear Club Stradale is a dream come true: you take a long vacation in a gorgeous villa with all the time you want to drive the most beautiful cars.

name: Get-A-Grip Chip and the Body Bugs
summary: Get-A-Grip Chip and the Body Bugs sends Chip on a new mission: enter the human body and dismantle digestive distress! In this satisfying 2D platformer, master Chip’s grappling hook to get things flowing. Raise an army of white blood cells to fight off the Body Bugs as you grapple for guts and glory.

name: Gex Jr.
summary:
Gex Jr. is a cancelled installment in the Gex series for the PlayStation. The game was developed by ImageBuilder Software and was pitched to Eidos Interactive.

A prototype of the game was released online by justz00t on April 2nd, 2022.

name: Get Your Sheep Together
summary: A 3D platformer where you herd your emotions by hopping, shrinking and dashing your way through obstacles. Don't hold in too many feelings or it may just blow up in your face!

name: Gemlands
summary: A short 1st person, Playstation 1'esque 3D platformer for lovers of collectathons

name: Gears of Phantasm: Destiny Tailored - Act I
summary: A classic story with fun exploration, an RPG like nothing you remembered. Familiar gameplay with new twists, building your Warriors into Legends.

name: Geometry Waves
summary: Shoot your way through waves of enemies and extreme bosses in this Roguelite space shooter. Advance in the ranks, upgrade your ship and unlock new mechanics, ships and mods that will make the game more challanging and interesting.

name: General Practitioner 2
summary: Live the life of two doctors in this brand-new medical simulated Visual Novel. Andrew and Julie are siblings and MDs and they recently inherited a once-renowned medical clinic from their aunt. Join them in rebuilding the clinic, hiring staff and living their lives. This time there are two of them!

name: Gem Tower Defense 2
summary: Gem tower defense is different from general tower defense games. The map of gem tower defense is extremely open and free. Players need to constantly plan and build labyrinths to delay the advance of waves of monsters hitting the fortress.

name: Gerel: Against the Corvus Empire
summary: A 2D Pixel Art Platformer with Metroidvania elements and a heartfelt story.

name: Geopoesis: Eos
summary: We destroyed Hestia, our home, our Earth. You have been charged to execute geopoesis on one of the scarce number of promising, but hostile, alien worlds, Eos. Our only chance of survival is for you to terraform the 13 very challenging areas on this hostile planet.

name: Get Ogre It: Escape Dungeons
summary: Play as Gobby, a little ogre who's been cursed and turned into a human in this, roguelike dungeon crawler. Shapeshift between ogre and human, escape ever-changing dungeons, deceive and hide from your enemies.

name: Get Packed: Couch Chaos
summary: Get Packed: Couch Chaos is the expanded edition of the couch co-op removals game that’s full of calamity and physics-based carnage for 1-4 players, and it’s now on Nintendo Switch!

name: Geospots
summary: Geospots is the fifteenth first-person point-and-click adventure game in the Carol Reed series, once again chronicling the adventures of the crime-solving British expat in Sweden. This time, Carol must solve the disappearance of a friend-of-a-friend by retracing their steps, made both easier and more difficult by the fact that cryptic clues to their recent activities abound, thanks to their geocaching hobby.

name: Gelatine
summary: Gelatine is an action-oriented sandbox game where you play as an ordinary slime trying to survive and establish a colony of fantastical creatures in a hostile environment.

name: GetsuFumaDen: Undying Moon - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
GetsuFumaDen: Undying Moon Digital Deluxe Edition combines intense roguelike hack-and-slash action with a stunning dark fantasy world, brought to life through the stroke of traditional Japanese art.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following bonus contents.
- A bonus game: The original "GetsuFumaDen": discover the original game with the guidebook, a newly added Quick Save feature, and an English localized Menu screen (in-game texts and the guidebook are in Japanese only)!
- A gallery mode with following contents limited to the Digital Deluxe edition
- Digital artbook: contains the game's key arts, stage concept designs, character designs, and the lore from the game.
- Mini-OST: contains 15 sound tracks from the game with its attractive atmosphere.

name: Gefeuert! Dein letzter Tag
summary: Clog the toilet, blow up the microwave, or get your butt bare on the copier - but no matter how you try to score points, don't let your boss catch you!

name: Get to the Top 2: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade
Gemini
summary: A Journey of Two Stars.

name: Genseki Wakusei
summary: Genseki Wakusei is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The goal is to explore Pershina's dream worlds and collect Stones (いし).

name: Genius vs. Antichrist 1
summary: An amazing adventure game . Sometimes as a RPG

name: Getaway Entertainment 6 Pack
summary:
Word Salad
Find the words hidden in a grid of letters. 32 Different levels. Up to 600 words per level.

Stuffin the Briefcase
Pack your briefcase for business or pleasure. Why do you need all those guns? 63 Different levels.

Featuring: Cascade
Place dice onto a 5x6 grid. Earn points for contiguous straights and 4's-of-a-kind. A different game every time you play. Engrossing and addictive.

Solitaire
Play either of two popular variants; Klondike or Las Vegas.

Dominoes
It's not the kid's game you may remember. Two traditional favorites, Seven-One-Spin and Five-Up. Play against 1, 2, or 3 of the 9 different computer opponents. Tutorial included.

Totem
A logic puzzler set in the Pacific Northwest. Choose from more than 20 difficulty settings.

name: Germinal
summary: Help Greg stay healthy during an epidemic as he jumps, hovers and cleans his way through quarantine with his disinfectant jetpack.Witness his developing mysophobia(fear of contamination) express itself in the increasingly difficult game play, and replay the game to master the mechanics or search for more story bits.

name: Genso Nikki
summary:
Genso Nikki is a fan made tribute to the Japanese indie game: Yume Nikki

Play as a boy trapped in his room. If you dare, turn out the lights and explore his mind. Collect effects to alter his appearance and powers, enabling him to access new areas, who know what you might find!

name: GenMobile
summary: The GenMobile is a handheld "console on a chip" manufactured by AtGames and distributed by Hyperkin. It was officially licensed by Sega. Like the Sega Nomad and the Retro Gen, it can play Sega Genesis and Sega Mega Drive cartridges. Unlike both consoles, it features 20 built-in games. It has a built-in 2.4 inch LCD screen but can also be connected to a TV set. It is compatible with cartridges of all regions and ships with a built-in rechargeable battery pack. Its design resembles that of a PlayStation Portable and comes in black and blue.

name: Genshin Funkin'
summary: Travel around the world of Teyvat as Hu-Tao, as you challenge others in a sing off. With 3 full weeks featuring fan songs and covers sung by some of the original Genshin voice actors! This was made as a tribute to the incredible talents of the Genshin voice actors. Includes easy and normal difficulties respectively, along with swapped charts to play the opponent’s side!

name: Geballer
summary: In this mouse-only Bullet Hell, you create your own problems! Featuring unique and strange bullets, different gameplay modes, extreme secrets and even a level editor, Geballer wants to softly stimulate the reptilian part of your brain until you disappear completely.

name: Gems of Destiny: Homeless Dwarf
summary: Enjoy the Match 3 gameplay in an intriguing story of dwarf Axel rebuilding his destroyed village. Earn coins by using 5 unique boosters to create a new city for Alex and his friends. Be amazed about the creation of the beautiful hand-drawn Dwarf's Forest World

name: Genopanic
summary: Genopanic is a pixel-art, Metroidvania-inspired adventure-platformer. Explore corridors of the space station, teeming with secrets and dangers, and engage in boss fights. Solve puzzles and uncover hidden mysteries in the dark atmosphere of a sci-fi research complex. Discover the truth with each step.

name: Gensou Tansaku Nitroid!
summary: Gensou Tansaku Nitroid! is a puzzle and exploration based platformer by the doujin circle Desunoya, the makers of other Touhou fangames such as Marisa and Alice and Guruguru Suika. The game stars Nitori Kawashiro as she explores Gensokyo in pursuit of an escaped "nuclear reactor."

name: Get Out of My Space
summary: These damned people have been reigning in our part of space for too long. They kidnap our people and conduct experiments on them. We cannot afford to be treated like this.

name: Generality
summary: The ultimate goal of Generality is to get all of the mods working seamlessly together. When finished, this pack will create an experience that feels like its own video game, totally separate from Minecraft.

name: Genso Yonbaiken: Tenshi no Daigyakushu
summary: A doujin game by Otoridenshi based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Get Rektorized
summary: Set enemies on fire in this action based anti-grav combat racer with an arsenal of heavy and unique weapons! Solve puzzles and gain skills to unlock reinterpreted tracks of old racing games, new ships, never-seen-before racemodes and other surprises. Oh and don't forget to shoot your friends online!

name: Gedaria: Fairytale Forest
summary: Expansion for the action 2D adventure Gedaria. Solve puzzles with your legendary rakes, rake leaves, create piles or destroy the leaf barrier. Blow the leaves with a wind or leaf blower. NEW control Emil the goose and look for his lost geese.

name: GemaBoy: Zero Origins
summary: Explore inner conscience & multiverse in order to recover your memories and become GemaBoy!

name: Geronimo
summary: Geronimo is an immersive, tactical CQB shooter built for Virtual Reality that depicts a modern-day world in which Special Forces operators are called to implement unconventional operations as members of elite teams. Engage in the most realistic combat experience available. "Who Dares, Wins"

name: Get Ready For School, Charlie Brown!
summary:
Get Ready for School, Charlie Brown! is an interactive educational game for Windows 3.1, Windows 95, and Apple Macintosh computers in 1995 and was developed by Morgan Interactive and published by Virgin Sound and Vision. You explore the world of Charlie Brown.

It is an educational game with many minigames and puzzles, including writing and dressing up Charlie Brown. It is also a visual dictionary, with spellings, definitions, and sentence usages both in text and in voiceover provided by one of the five voiced Peanuts child characters who appear; they are also accompanied by a Peanuts comic strip either relating to the word or where the word is used in dialogue. There are two settings; learn or play.

name: Gex 3: Deep Cover Gecko
summary:
When Gex is watching TV one day, he discovers that Rez has kidnapped Agent Xtra (the agent from Gex: Enter the Gecko's backstory), head of the TV Terrorist Defense Unit, to get to him. He teleports to the batcave-like lair he has in the Media Dimension, and begins another adventure. Each level parodies a certain aspect of television culture (here the levels exist as stand-alone channels). Gex enters each level through a television set. He must collect remote controls to advance to the next level in order to complete his mission and rescue Xtra.

This N64 port removes some suggestive content.

name: Gensokyo Defenders Plus
summary:
The Traps are trickier than ever, and new characters are introduced: meet Yukari Yakumo, Toyosatomimi no Miko and Byakuren Hijiri!
Use your new powers to clear the bonus stages!

name: Gengar
summary:
You play as Gengar.
You battle against Gengar.

name: Genimas: Life Reborn
summary: you are Drassil, a demigod raised and trained by Freyja far from civilization, your destiny is to defeat the evil entity known as Ragnarok and to achieve it, you will have to evolve genetically traveling through the 9 Nordic worlds.

name: Get the Ball Rolling
summary: A single player ball rolling adventure/platformer with puzzles, powerups, physics, portals and gravity flips. Get the Ball Rolling!

name: Genso Rondo: Additional character "Yukari Yakumo"
summary: Yukari Yakumo joins the battle as an additional player character!

name: Genso Rondo: Additional character "Aya Shameimaru"
summary: Aya Shameimaru joins the battle as an additional player character!

name: Genso Rondo: Additional character "Flandre Scarlet"
summary: Flandre Scarlet joins the battle as an additional player character!

name: Gekka Ryouran Romance
summary:
In a scenic valley, there's a celebrity boarding school called "Hakuou Gakuen".

At a glance the school is full of smart and beautiful guys. Behind it, a secret club nobody knows of was conducted.

To others, it's the mysterious going-home club. But the real name is actually the "Forbidden Date Club". The after school chime is the date signal. The strict rule is to always get the girl they're targeting. It doesn't matter who, the club members spread love like night hosts. These students are called the "Gekka Ryouran".

The love renaissance / love game unfolds by the hands of these rich guys, who seem to sneer at those who admire love. However, those who are obsessed with their charms couldn't stop asking for more despite the excessive payment.

It's a dangerous love, you can't go back after touching it.
Now, the forbidden flowers are blooming!

name: Gensokyo Daisenso
summary: A doujin game by INSIDE SYSTEM based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Get into Backrooms
summary: This is a back room theme leisure games, Enter the back room, avoid the entity, find the exit, and find the truth. There are cakes, milk tea and party balloons =) There's nothing here. Don't believe it=( Join us =) Run away=(

name: GemCore
summary: GemCore is a procedurally generated fast-paced roguelike arcade game where you play as an individual who has lived and died in a dystopian universe, but in this universe, debt follows you well beyond the grave.

name: Genso Flood Front
summary: A doujin game by FriendSea based on the Touhou Project series.

name: Genesis Noir: Collector's Edition
summary:
The Genesis Noir: Collector's Edition includes:
- Collector's Box
- Artbook with 100 pages and developer commentary
- Limited Acrylic Charm
- Sticker Sheet
- Two-sided Poster
- Spinner Enamel Pin
- Postcard Set
- Wrist Watch
- Lenticular Card

name: Geoblast
summary: A Playdate arcade puzzle tile-matching game, inspired by games such as Dynomite, Puzzle Bobble/Bust-a-Move and Magical Drop.

name: Geostatic
summary: Geotastic is a crowdfunded free-to-play geography quiz game that you can play alone or in multiplayer.

name: Geometry Arena 2
summary: Geometry Arena 2 is a free-form arena-shooter Roguelite game, dedicated to creating an exciting battle experience. Freely combine difficulty options, components, modules and upgrades to create the best gaming experience for yourself!

name: Get it Hard
summary: This next generation simulation of the most stressful situation in life gets you the training you need. Get stress resistant and get it hard as fast as you can!

name: Generic Kart Racing
summary: Generic Kart Racing is a celebration of the retro, 16-bit kart racers of old - a modern twist on the ol' tried and true kart racing formula!

name: GeneWars
summary: This is the story of the birth of life. You will take on the role of the 23,008689th sperm cell to be born, fighting and advancing to fulfil your birthright, to create a great legend.

name: Geranium
summary: The story follows the journey of Geranium, a female swordswoman with amnesia.

name: Gem Venture
summary: Jump, dash, and mine your way through obstacles and enemies in this platforming tribute to the classics. Restore the Sacred Gems of Aventurine, or else it will become a land of nothingness.

name: Gentlemen of the Row
summary: A massive integrated collection of mods, tweaks, and fixes that greatly enhances the PC version of the game while still staying true to the spirit of the original. The mod has been carefully balanced to be used by either a newcomer or a veteran to the series, and offers 100+ new clothing items with 120+ new logos, improved weather including a darker night time and more vibrant colours in daytime, plane and boat mechanics for customizing, additional missions, new vehicle dealerships, new weapons, new cribs, new homies and gang styles, new taunts and compliments, new walking styles, 100+ new ambient music tracks for purchase, more car paints, more skin colors, tattoos, makeup, optional 360/PS3 onscreen controller prompts, new cheat codes including NPC morphs, and tons of tweaks and bug fixes.

name: Genderfelt
summary: genderfelt is a short interactive zine, in which you read the blog of young person called Anon, going through the process of discovering himself. It focuses on the issue of transmedicalism, and how one can help to pull their peers away from a harmful ideology.

name: Generations Arena
summary: Generations Arena is the "ultimate tribute" to ID Software, as it combines play styles and characters from all games previous to Quake III's release, such as Doom, Wolfenstein, and both Quake 1 and , combining them all into one giant multiplayer mod that pits characters from all those games in Quake III style arenas.

name: Geese and Gats
summary: A take on the classic round-based survival game. But the geese have spears

name: Geared for Fear
summary: Geared for Fear is a heist-themed car combat game, with a focus on giving each car a unique playstyle.

name: Generations
summary: A puzzle game about organization and family.

name: Geomeun Jeonseol
summary: Geomeun Jeonseol is an action, fantasy and RPG game that set in an old legend.

name: Gekitotsu! Saikyou Pro Yakyuu Dream Battle
Gems Defenders
summary: Match 3 Game, Tower Defense Game and Story driven RPG. Gems Defenders have it all! Match enchanted gems to power up your town, heal your heroes, charge powerful spells, defeat the enemies that are storming the gates of your city and uncover lore of the mysterious Aldenor!

name: GeoDiscover
summary: An attractive geographic discovery game

name: Gemini Chase
summary: Pew Pew, begone pirate scum! Gemini Chase is an VR arcade shooter, inspired by games of the 80s. You are being chased by space pirates and their cohorts. Can you use your weapons effectively to make your escape?

name: Genzai: Serialization
summary: Genzai:Serialization is a fantasy Japanese style Roguelike card game. You will play a role of one cute girl to explore the Sakura Mountain and use cards with yin-yang system to defeat different enemies. Many interesting creatures will also bring you a variety of possible plot journeys.

name: Genesis: Human Destiny
summary:
Genesis: Human Destiny is a space saga about the eternal search, phantom hope, and new menace. Faced with an invincible enemy, humanity sends more and more spacecrafts to foreign galaxies outside the Solar System, trying to stop the approach of inevitable Armageddon.
Genesis offers you a combination of genres that will magnetize you as a black hole: text quest, spaceship simulator, survival, adventure, and rogue-like RPG.
Solve a hundred urgent problems and riddles: how to catch the One who got out of the Xenobiologist's body? What does the phrase in 327 human languages received from space ​​mean? How to identify a cyborg among the human beings? Why do engines go dead after meeting with the Flying Dutchman? Can space vampires really cause blind sight? Who is to blame and what is to be done?
Buy, equip and upgrade your spaceships to create an invincible space fleet!
Become the guardian of the galaxy! Heroic astronauts are waiting for your orders!
Send your cruisers and storm-troopers beyond the horizon and to a trip to the Moon, Mars and thousands of other planets in still nameless nebulae and star systems!
Overcome the gravity laws and show how the Earth empire strikes back! Neither vacuum, nor dark energy or antimatter, nor comets infected by intelligent cyber viruses will interrupt your odyssey!
Complete your own star trek to the end and decide whether the human civilization will live or die!

name: Geometric Feel the Beats
summary: Inspired by a space theme and with touches of “Tron” (we love this movie!) the game is fun and competition accompanied by frantic music.

name: Geunyeoga Dasi Noraehal Ttaekkaji
summary: My friend has become a girl after I came back from army? Visual novel with TS heroine.

name: Get in the Car, Loser!: The Fate of Another World
summary: Every 976 years, the heavens pick one warrior to hear the calling and use the Sword of Fate to seal away the Machine Devil. Emily Harmless used to be an activist, a librarian, and a scholar... but she had to put that all aside when she was chosen as that warrior. Is there any hope for her to find peace in the burning ruins of her world after carrying out the heavens’ mission?

name: Geolosys
summary: Geolosys is 2048 game in which you have to earn new gems by earning points. More points - more gems, that is the main rule!

name: Get Out! 2
summary: Get Out! 2 is a lovingly crafted cartoon-style escape the room game, with over a dozen different screens, many MANY objects to pick up and crazy puzzles to solve.

name: Generation Zero: Base Defense Pack
summary: Your battles with countless machines have paid off - other Resistance members have become inspired by your successes and have designed new structures to help keep your base varied and ready for any kind of attack. This is only the beginning of how to expand on your base, and with the following structures you are ready for battle once more.

name: Generation Zero: Blockbuster Vanity Pack
summary: Everyone knows that the summer season is a perfect time to sit back with an action-packed blockbuster and let the movie magic happen. And few decades had such excellent ones as the 1980s, so in tribute to some of those, you can now mix and match between 4 iconic new outfits as well as express your love for them using 6 emotes.

name: Generation Zero: Schweet Vanity Pack
summary: The summer warmth has finally reached Sweden, and it’s time to celebrate Midsummer with some schweet new outfits from the 1980s. Mix between the various articles from four stylish new sets, each with a unique combination of accessories, clothing and hairstyles. Express your excitement with 5 stellar new emotes, and start dancing around the maypole.

name: Gentleman Dress Up
summary:
This is a small fan game featuring Gonta Gokuhara from NDRV3.

Dress up Gonta appropriately for the most gentlemanly occasions.

name: Gensmak!
summary: A fresh take on trivia that's actually new, with strategy needed to win, hints by comedians, and questions for every generation. Inspired by the popularity and fun of the original Gensmak trivia card game, Gensmak digital is a standalone digital game that can be played IRL or virtually with people around the world.

name: GemVenture
summary:
Based on Puzzle Quest: Challenge of the Warlords, GemVenture is similar puzzle game developed for the NES by Tom Livak for the PDRoms Coding Competition in 2009.
You fight against a series of monsters by swapping adjacent gems. Each match of 3 or more gems of the same color increases your mana, and special heart and spike gems heal you and/or hurt your opponent. Press select to cast spells using the mana you've gained. Your opponent will then take a turn matching gems, and you continue back and forth until only one is left standing. Defeat your opponent and level up your attributes before taking on the next foe. GemVenture features 6 character classes, 18 spells, and 20 monsters, each with their own characteristics.

name: Geas
summary:
Welcome to Geas, an exciting and challenging multiplayer online roleplaying game or MUD (Multi User Dungeon) of unmatched complexity and realism.
Geas’ class- and level-less system allows your character to improve and advance the skills and abilities he or she uses most, thereby giving you maximum freedom and unlimited possibilities to develop your alter ego into the kind of character you imagine.

The features of Geas are too extensive to list, but they include an unmatched combat system, a dynamic economy, multiple languages, a player enforced legal system, hundreds of skills, an unbelievably detailed world, and roleplay which is both mandatory and strictly enforced.

name: Generative Dungeon
summary:
Within the Generative Dungeon collection lies 3,000 unique playable, customizable RPGs. While the game mechanics remain fundamentally similar throughout, each dungeon has its own set of unique traits, from the default character and number of levels to the starting level and pixelated tileset.

Alongside these unique properties, each dungeon functions as both a digital asset to the owner, and a predominantly skill-based game to the players. Owners may keep levels in their originally-generated state, or build them from the ground-up, creating an adventure full of enemies, lore, and so much more. Players can level up their character by progressing through floors, defeating enemies, and purchasing upgrades and scrolls through shops. They can play each dungeon to completion, or race to the end in hopes of making a name for themselves atop the leaderboard.

As stated previously, GD is much more than a game – it's a digital asset to the owners, allowing them to showcase their creativity to gamers while providing them with utility larger than the game itself.

name: Ge.ne.sis: Down the Road of Tales
summary: Ge.ne.sis is a turn-based strategy RPG made in flash for web browsers focusing on Neraine, a brooding teenage girl who mysteriously ends up in a bizarre fantasy world. Fight alongside other party members and experience the interesting tarot inspired summoning system in order to traverse this world.

name: Get Home Safe
summary: A tired man was on his way back to the river. However, he had to go home alone in a desolate atmosphere.

name: Genjintch Tamagotchi
summary: The Genjintch is a limited edition Tamagotchi released in Japan during November 1997 in theatres that were showing the film "Peking Man", which served as the base concept for the Genjintch Tamagotchi.

name: GeGeGe no Kitaro
summary: A game for the Sega Pico based on the GeGeGe no Kitaro franchise.

name: GeGeGe no Kitaro: Yokai Yokochou
summary: GeGeGe no Kitaro: Yokai Yokochou is a social-network game where players get lost in the GeGeGe Forest and unites with the yōkai to help defeat evil yōkai, develop Yōkai Yokochō, and aim for a paradise where many cute yōkai can gather.

name: Generation Zero: Resistance Weapons Pack
summary: When times get tough, tenacious Resistance fighters need to find more creative ways to keep their armory stocked with effective weapons. With less ammo around, the Resistance of Östertörn have started building their own weapons to keep fighting the machine invasion. Despite their more makeshift nature, these new weapons are proving to be both efficient and deadly.

name: GeoDepths
summary: Pilot your drill deep below the surface of a barren moon to find ore to refine into resources, which will be used in drill upgrades and construction of your homebase. Upgrades will allow you to drill deeper to find more types of ores. Explore caves to uncover mysteries and secrets.

name: Gendai Daisenryaku: Ultimate War
summary: Revealed at Space World 1999, it was being developed as a turn-based strategy game, very similar to Nintendo's Wars series, but with a realistic setting. This game would have supported 4-player online battles using the Disk Drive's Randnet service. The game was delayed multiple times and eventually changed format to a cartridge. The change in format led to the removal of the online mode, and ultimately, Ultimate War was cancelled altogether.

name: Gemstones
summary: Casual Arcade-Puzzle game, where you move gems around to pair them together! Relax and get the highest score possible, earning cosmetics along the way.

name: GeoJelly
summary: Born within unknown you instinctively seek for freedom as an experiment defect. In GeoJelly you have to find your way out of dystopian laboratory through platforming while avoiding traps and collecting keys necessary to push forward. Are you gonna find a way out?

name: Gestures on iOS
summary: Just use the gestures, your iPhone/iPad or iPod touch offers you, to play this funny game. Are you fast enough to follow the rhythm? And watch out, some times you also have to think what you are doing :-)

name: Get Mouse
summary: Get Mouse is a mouse-feeding puzzle game by Sen (MouSe) made in Wolf RPG Editor. A simple ten-minute game with 8 stages where you have to get the mouse his cheese.

name: GeneRally 2
summary: GeneRally 2 is a top-down arcade racing game with a built-in track editor. Challenge the track records in time-trial; compete on the sofa with friends; or let your creativity flow by creating your very own racing tracks to share with the world!

name: GeoChampion
summary:
Welcome to Geo Champion.
Do you like challenges?
Try to become the world champion of geography by answering the 640 quiz while visiting the 160 countries of the world.
Country name, Capitals, their location, Areas, Population, Flags, nothing will be secret for you anymore!

name: Get Dumped
summary: Get Dumped by Arashi! You are Michi, a rather lame high school girl who has the perfect boyfriend. But suddenly he decides to dump you! When he agrees to go on one last date with you, you'll have to work hard to get him back!

name: Gem Collapse
summary: Fast paced block busting fun in this action packed game! Test your skill and reflexes as you race to complete the level before the blocks overpower you. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: Genjin Show: Tobidase! VB Genjin
summary: Genjin Show: Tobidase! VB Genjin is a cancelled game for the Virtual Boy.

name: Gemscape
summary: Ultimate puzzle game with unique gameplay and endless fun! On this fun journey, you will solve exciting puzzles, receive coins for unlocking new levels, use boosters to continue your saga and become the last hope to save the Flying Islands and their magical inhabitants!

name: Generation Zero: Eastern European Weapons Pack
summary: The Östertörn weapons collection is now expanded with new guns from eastern Europe! Use them to fight deadly machines and raise the resistance!

name: Generation Zero: Camo Weapon Skins Pack
summary: What is the best way to stand out from the Östertörn crowd? Add some color to your life (and rifle)! This DLC brings you 10 brand new weapon skins specially designed to take that flair to the next level.

name: Generation Zero: Motorbikes Pack
summary: You can now travel through Östertörn on new types of Motorbikes! It’s faster. It’s louder. It’s more exciting! The motorbikes will get you places quicker, but they’ll need fuel to drive. Plan your travel strategically so you won't run out of gasoline unexpectedly, and be sure to check out abandoned cars and gas stations and find jerry cans to fuel up. Or craft the fuel by yourself! You can ride on 3 different models. Each of them has their own strengths and weaknesses.

name: Generation Zero: Tactical Equipment Pack
summary: The Resistance fighters have gotten craftier with their combat techniques, trying out both established and improvised equipment for battle purposes. This particular batch brings both explosive and defensive elements to the battle and can be crafted using materials collected across Östertörn. Additionally, a small amount has been put into your Plundra storage box for experimentation purposes. So head out there and wreak some havoc!

name: Generation Zero: Base Support Pack
summary: As you continue to successfully fend off countless machine attacks, the Resistance has once again been inspired to create new structures and decorations to upgrade your base with. Whether you decide to fortify your base or simply add a personal touch to it is up to you, but with this pack, you should be ready to face anything.

name: Generation Zero: US Weapons Pack 2
summary: While the survivors of Östertörn have already managed to scavenge some US and Soviet weapons, NATO has decided it’s time to broaden the arsenal even further, dropping another shipment of American weapons across the Resistance controlled territories. While this is still not enough to stave off the machine invasion, it should help the fighters tackle most situations and battles.

name: Generation Zero: Soviet Weapons Pack
summary: The Östertörn survivors are no longer the only ones fighting the war against FNIX. Soviet soldiers in small and specialized forces have been seen in the northern regions using moveable defenses to set up temporary camps. They seem to be fighting the machines, but does that make them allies, or do they have their own motives for entering Swedish territory?

name: Generation Zero: US Weapons Pack
summary:
Since the fateful day of the "Cataclysm", NATO and the USSR have each been closely monitoring the situation in Sweden, raising their preparedness levels and weighing options.

When proof was obtained that there were survivors hiding in multiple locations in Östertörn, resolution "Reaction: Phase 1" was passed at NATO, as an urgent, temporary solution: large quantities of standard-issue weapons used in the American military were to be dropped all over Östertörn, in order to offer immediate assistance and support to the various groups of survivors.

name: Generation Zero: Tubular Vanity Pack
summary: Time to adorn some colourful retro outfits to celebrate spring in true 80s fashion! With four new sets that you can mix and match as you see fit, these outfit combinations consist of new hairstyles, clothing, accessories and more. On top of that you will get 6 ace new emotes, which let you dance in the fresh spring sun like a true Swede.

name: Generation Zero: Rivals and Experimental Weapons
summary: Taking on enemy machines has reached a whole new level with the introduction of the Rival System and Experimental Weapons. While certain enemies will now be shaped and hardened through your interactions with the world, your new tier of weapons will provide you with enough firepower to hold your own against this new generation of machines.

name: Generation Zero: Bikes
summary: You can now traverse the streets, forests, and coasts of Östertörn with a sparkling new bicycle, dodging machines as you go. Not only will you be able to cross greater distances more efficiently, but you will also be able to utilize these handy bikes as strategic tools to lure machines to your ambush location. Just remember, you are not immune to the spray of bullets or rockets that head your way once an enemy spots you.

name: Generation Zero: Base Warfare Starter Bundle
summary: The Generation Zero: Base Warfare Starter Bundle includes the main game and five DLCs that gives you everything you need to fortify your base as well as expanding your arsenal with a wide range of new weapons.

name: Geopoly
summary:
Become the largest real-estate tycoon in the world!

Start your real estate empire and become the Billionaire you always dreamed of, buying, selling and renting properties, buildings, and shops like in the real world.

name: Get to the Gate
summary: GetToTheGate is a roguelike about a girl that needs to reach the Gate to the world of the living while being extremely scared of monsters. When her fear builds up, she loses her mana and runs to safety. Find a shortcut to bypass the enemies and explore the dungeon from a new location.

name: Genba no Kizuna
summary: A mesozoic murder mystery, 4 suspects, 1 truth. Investigate, interrogate and present evidence as you set out to unravel the case with your team. Will you be able to accurately determine who took the victim's life? Or will your deductions lead you to arrest someone for a crime they did not commit...?

name: Geometry May. I swear it's a nice free game
summary: I swear it's a nice runner game

name: Geometric Hell
summary: Geometric Hell is an arcade bullet-hell shooter with minimalistic graphics. Survive waves of aggressive geometric shapes and upgrade to keep up with the progressive increase in difficulty. Many deaths are expected before you get a chance to fight the final boss.

name: GeraScopia
summary: When lost in the Depths, the only way to go is up. You will Escape- one way or another.

name: Get Off My Lawn
summary: As the lawn-loving Blue Mollet, it is up to you to keep other Mollets off your grass, by running them over with your lawnmower!

name: Generations
summary: In this stone age survival game, you must use all your skills to survive in a harsh and unforgiving environment. From crafting tools and shelter, to hunting and gathering food, you will need to do whatever it takes to stay alive. With all these conditions to contend with, will you survive?

name: Gem Phrase
summary:
Play the classic game of guessing the phrase, combined with popular gem puzzle matching. Solve the phrase and earn in-game coins.
Start a game by choosing from Phrases, Movie Titles, Song Titles, Sports Teams, Space, Books, Places, Bible and History!

name: GearToyGear
summary: Super fast-paced 3D shooter.

name: Gear.Club Unlimited: Limited Edition Cars Pack 1
Gear.Club Unlimited: Limited Edition Cars Pack 2
Generation N: Identity Included
summary: "Generation N: Identity Included" is a 2D puzzle platformer. You as an AI will complete levels and help your creator with life decisions

name: Gem Jam
summary:
It is colorful and looks simple and yet it is a challenging and addictive puzzle.
The goal is to toggle the colors of the gems, with a minimum number of steps, so they look like the pattern shown on the screen. You will also win gems when you solve the puzzle.
It's not that easy! When you tap a gem not only it changes its color but also the colors of its neighbors. You must plan your moves carefully, or you will find yourself in a bit of a jam.
If you are in trouble you can use the help button to show you the correct move, but it will cost you one gem.
There are plenty of levels to play for a long time and new ones will be added in future updates of the game. You won't get bored for sure!

name: Geometry League
summary: You like soccer? You like space ships? Geometry League is made for you! Enter the first online inter galactic league and face off players from all other the world!

name: Get Ghost!
summary:
Meet Ghost, the biggest menace to hit Stunt City after the Big Quake.
Ride with him and his misfit friends. Break all the speed limits and get to visit all of Stunt City while being chased by the entire police force.
Get Ghost! is the next generation running game! You can jump, duck, rocket jump, glide, fly planes, climb on cars, ride clouds, jump on roofs and pass through buildings.

name: Gen 2.1. No Escape
summary: Delve into a VHS-style single player FPS experience blending survival horror and classic horror. Battle against Shaggoths and Necrozombies as you collect resources and fight to survive, all while uncovering the terrifying secrets of H.P. Lovecraft's "In the Mountains of Madness".

name: Gemstone Guardians
summary: Gemstone Guardians is a tower defense game where selection and combinations are key. Similar to a game of poker, players are given a set of random towers each round and must make the best combinations to prevent the waves of enemies from reaching the end.

name: Geko: Entering The Pipe
summary: Geko: entering the pipe is a casual, fast-paced game where you play Geko, an unlucky lizard who ends up in two plumbing pipes while trying to catch a fly. Help Geko dodge all the enemies and obstacles and escape the pipes, so he can finally get back to his hunt.

name: Gears
summary: Adam and his friends gather for a beer in a bar... After being kidnapped by an assassin... he will have to play a dangerous and deadly game to save his life and that of his friends.

name: Get! Monster
summary:
After summon war, Monsters have no masters, It is a problem to rebuild kingdom. So king recruit heroes for destroy monsters.
Hire and upgrade your heroes, then fight and destroy monsters.

name: Genius Quiz
summary: Genius Quiz is an expanded version of the first game in the trivia series, now featuring 100 questions, a three-lives system, and a leaderboard.

name: Genius Quiz 1
summary: Genius Quiz 1 is a port of the original Gênio Quiz for mobile devices, now translated into English.

name: Genius Quiz 6
summary: Genius Quiz 6 is the sixth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Genius Quiz 7
summary: Genius Quiz 7 is the seventh entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Genius Quiz 8
summary: Genius Quiz 8 is the eighth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Gensmak! Food Fight!
summary: Standalone expansion of Gensmak! party trivia. Gensmak! Food Fight! includes trivia questions featuring culinary pop culture from Gen Z back through the Greatest Generation. Just like in the main game, Gensmak!, there's strategy needed to win, hints by comedians, and questions for every generation.

name: Genius Quiz Poke
summary:
Genius Quiz Poke is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with questions to test your knowledge of the Pokémon universe.
The game works as always: 50 questions, and once you miss one, you're back at the beginning.

name: Genie
summary: Explore fantastic environments as Lula, as she journeys to discover the meaning of the Genie and fulfill her destiny.

name: Genesis of a Small God
summary: You have awoken as a small god. As you accumulate the faith and souls of your followers, you will learn incredible new abilities. Protect, guide your people and smite any threats that may arise. The fate of your world is in your hands.

name: Genius Quiz 2
summary: Genius Quiz 2 is a port of the original Gênio Quiz 2 for mobile devices, now translated into English.

name: Genius Quiz 3
summary: Genius Quiz 3 is a port of the original Gênio Quiz 3 for mobile devices, now translated into English.

summary: Genius Quiz 4 is a port of the original Gênio Quiz 4 for mobile devices, now translated into English.

summary: Genius Quiz 5 is a port of the original Gênio Quiz 5 for mobile devices, now translated into English.

summary: Genius Quiz 9 is the ninth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

summary: Genius Quiz 10 is the tenth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

summary: Genius Quiz 11 is the eleventh entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

summary: Genius Quiz 12 is the twelfth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.
