summary: Genius Quiz 13 is the thirteenth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

summary: Genius Quiz 14 is the fourteenth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

summary: Genius Quiz 15 is the fifteenth entry to the trivia game series with brand new fifty questions that challenges your brain.

name: Genius Quiz DBZ
summary: Genius Quiz DBZ is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with questions to test your knowledge of the Dragon Ball universe.

name: Genius Quiz Soccer
summary: Genius Quiz Soccer is a soccer-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz Christmas
summary: Genius Quiz Christmas is a Christmas-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz HP
summary: Genius Quiz HP is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with questions to test your knowledge of the Harry Potter universe.

name: Genius Quiz Reverse
summary: Genius Quiz Reverse is a spin-off of Genius Quiz where everything in the game is reversed.

name: Genius Quiz SW
summary: Genius Quiz SW is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with questions to test your knowledge of the Star Wars universe.

name: Genius Quiz Animes
summary: Genius Quiz Animes is an anime-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

summary: Genius Quiz Heroes is a superhero-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz Maker
summary: Genius Quiz Maker is a spin-off of Genius Quiz where you can create your own version of the game or play the ones created by your friends.

name: Genius Quiz Animals
summary: Genius Quiz Animals is an animal-themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions that challenge your brain.

name: Genius Quiz GOT
summary: Genius Quiz GOT is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the Game of Thrones universe.

summary: Genius Quiz Countries is a themed version of Genius Quiz, with fifty questions about various countries that will challenge your brain.

summary: Genius Quiz Fort. Battle Royale is an unofficial-themed version of the Genius Quiz game, now with fifty questions to test your knowledge of the game Fortnite.

name: Gems of Magic: Double Pack
summary:
Rescue the Fuzzy family and save the enchanted forest in 100 challenging levels!

Embark on an enchanting adventure to find your destiny by rebuilding the forest village and fend off the goblins in this exciting Match 3 adventure!

name: Gear for Heroes
summary:
Train and hire blacksmiths so we can equip our warriors with the best weapons we can craft. As you improve your idle forge, our troops will get epic gear to put in their inventory slots - new armour for health, new swords for attack, new staves for magic.
Is this an RPG? Is this strategy? Is it idle? All three at the same time. Raise your empire by equipping your soldiers, and let them train and raise health while you’re afk. Your blacksmiths will work tirelessly to equip the hero and warriors with epic loot so they can go on mighty quests to forge empires.

name: Gekko: Episode of Amelia
summary: In a stage where swords, machines, and ponytails appear in modern society A school love-comedy visual novel in which you can enjoy an exciting and thrilling love story This is the second installment of the Gekko series. In this work, you can enjoy the love story of Amelia, a tsundere police girl.

name: Getting to the Other Side!!!
summary: A modern spin on the classic arcade game. Play the only game that allows the player to run around as a crazy chicken! Complete each level and try to reach the end if you dare!

name: Genshindle
summary: Wordle game based on Genshin Impact characters.

name: Gemsa
summary: In this fast-paced puzzle game, line up gemstones in horizontal rows for points and added time; but it's not that simple! Each level demands a different color of gemstone! Drag your finger across unwanted gems and they will shatter, leaving the good ones to fall into place. Stack them for big combos and big points! Watch for special items as well; touching a "B" symbol will destroy all gems of the same color that you touched. Touching a "C" symbol will convert gems of the color you touched into the color for that level!

name: Gemcrusty
summary: This game is about treasure hunters who dig underground to find valuable gems.

name: Get Your Tentacles Off My Waifu
summary: Tentacle monsters have taken pony waifus hostage. It's your job to save them all through extreme violence, achieve pony zen, do Stardust responsibly, and don't think about the meaning of one guy’s war against the universe. Or why cats. This is an accessible cute 'em up after all!

name: Gezeichnet: Unsere Flucht 1945
summary: Gezeichnet: Unsere Flucht 1945 ist ein emotionales, atmosphärisches Survival-Adventure mit einem Fokus auf Narrative und lebendig gemachter Historie.

name: Getting Freaky With Fujiki
summary: In a secluded room of a coworking space, you meet a female student named Fujiki. She talks to you about things in her daily life which you quietly listen to in your room. All while hoping for some peace and quiet. How will your daily life change in your interactions with Fujiki?

name: George Pontos: The Stolen Lyre
summary: In this action dangerous dungeons platformer game you are on a quest to find the lost instrument lyra. However, when George is on his way to find the instrument he is met by obstacles and bunch of crazy barbarians and other deadly dangers in this classic platform game. You don't always have to kill your enemies, you can also avoid them to save your dynamite and ammo. You have to be careful, you are in a world dangerous and spears are shot from some dungeons platforms.

name: Get the Heck Out
summary: Shoot your way through 100 levels of this roguelite bullet hell. Start weak, get powerups, become OP.

name: Gex: Enter the Gecko
summary:
A conversion of the 3D platform title, this game features all the same levels shrunk down onto the Game Boy Color screen.

Gex is sucked into his TV, and must explore all of the TV style levels, find the remote controls and save the world of television from Rez, who is planning to take over the world's TV networks, as well as return home. Each level is based on a popular TV genre, such as horror, sci-fi and comedy, and has mentions of well known programs and movies along the way.

name: Get the Honey
summary: Get the Honey is a new kind of brick breaker game that takes the best of Breakout, Peggle, and Pinball, and mixes them all together. Collect all the honey and help these little bees jump, blast, and bounce their way to victory through 120 levels using nothing but a bounce pad and your wits. Adventure awaits!

name: Get Out Joey!
summary: In a dark and stunning world, swing from platform to platform and try to rise to the surface. Thanks to his spear and your agility, make Joey a free man...

name: Georgie and Me
summary: Assume the role of Jack Kursby, an intergalactic hired gun with his partner dog, Georgie. Together your skills will be strained against a most despicable enemy in a high octane story across the stars.

name: Gene Rain Wind Tower: Ultimate Edition
summary: Gene Rain Wind Tower is a next-gen third person shooter game. The story is set in a futuristic world, with a linear narrative structure, and uses shocking visual effects to present a brand new world for the players ' enjoyment. ‘ULTIMATE EDITION' integrates all DLC content, you can experience new stories, you can get rare weapons, and the complete game experience will make you immersed in it.

name: General Staff: Black Powder
summary: The General Staff: Black Powder Wargaming System is the ultimate in simulating 18th and 19th century battles. Built around the mate AI it comes with dozens of battles (Waterloo, Gettysburg, Little Big Horn (with alternative scenarios including Gatling guns), Antietam, and more.

name: Gekiatsu!! Pachige Tamashii Max Evangelion 7 x Seimei no Kodou
Geminiii
summary:
Don't expect gravity to be complicit to your wishes

How will you apply pressure to the variables? How many turns will it take you to solve Geminiii?

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter - Liva's Story
summary: Become the leader your team needs you to be in Liva's Story. Play as Liva - the Sparrow - after she and her small group of Resistance members are forced to flee Copenhagen and retreat to the small village of Tinglev.

name: Get Rich Slow
summary: Welcome to Get Rich Slow, a life simulator with roguelite elements that lets you experience an entire life in a day. Make the choices that determine your character's fate and shape their story.

name: General Knowledge Quiz
summary: At what level do you think your general knowledge is? Here's a fun way to find out! This GK quiz contains a bunch of trivia knowledge questions and answers from different categories and fun facts for every single quiz question you answer. Whether it's geography quiz, history trivia game or sports quiz questions that you prefer - this GK quiz trivia game includes all of them stack into one unique world general knowledge game. One thing is for sure: you won't get bored answering those quick general knowledge trivia questions.

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter - Modstand Bundle
summary:
The Gerda: A Flame in Winter Modstand Bundle contains:

Gerda: A Flame in Winter (main game)
Gerda: A Flame in Winter - Liva's Story (DLC)

name: Gennady
summary: An old-school action platformer with rogue-lite elements. Imagine your grumpy neighbor blowing up the backside of an alien world with a blaster instead of resting after his shift. Blood, noir, and green slime.

name: Gearhead Karting
summary: The ultimate kart racing game with deep customization, realistic physics, and a variety of game modes. Build, tune, and race your way to victory!

name: GetBackers Dakkanya: Dakkan da yo! Zenin Shuugou!!
summary: GetBackers Dakkanya: Dakkandayo! Zenin Shuugou!! is a beat 'em up videogame released only in Japan by Konami for the PS2 in 2003.

name: Gentlemen's Puzzle Club
summary: Try to complete all puzzles in this amazing relaxation game and collect all locked girls behind the covers.

name: Geometry Race
summary: Race in the crazy world of geometry shapes. Aim towards the setting sun and watch out for obstacles that will try to push you off the track.

name: GEO Wunder Natur Puzzle: Echter Puzzlespass für Unterwegs
summary: Solve puzzles of nature in different modes to collect stars and to unlock more images.

name: Gensouband
summary:
This game is a variant based on the popular open source roguelike game Hengband.
It adds a number of Touhou Project-related elements to Hengband, as well as significant modifications to races, professions, magic, game systems, and more.

name: Genotype
summary: Your weapons are alive! Print creatures and use them as weapons and tools as you explore this Metroidvania FPS adventure. Morph yourself tiny, upgrade, and locate collectibles to advance to the next boss. Explore large non-linear maps and explore an environment woven together with a complex story.

name: Gehenna
summary: The sun has vanished, and darkness corrodes the world. An angel named Helvetica is summoned. She claims to be "an angel that surpasses even the gods" and repels the distorted sun goddess. However, in order to restore the sun, she must capture the goddess.

name: Gem King
summary: Free-to-play iOS 5 port of Kickin Momma game added independently under a new title. The update also includes iCloud for game save files, full Twitter integration and Airplay Mirroring.

name: Getting Nuts
summary: Climb up giant trees fighting angry birds and avoiding obstacles - but make sure you bring home some nuts for dinner!!

name: Geometra - Join the Colors
summary:
Geometra ...
... is tricky
...it's fun
...is addicting
... will drive you out of your boredom!
Play now Geometra and combine objects of the same color to create a new high score.

name: Gefangen in der Drachenfestung
summary: Join the PLAYMOBIL-kids Laura and Alex on an exciting trip into the world of knights. Princess Laura gets kidnapped from the evil wizard Grimmbart and captured in Dragon's Castle. Squire Alex wants to rescue her. He needs to win the knights' tournament as well as beating the dragon, other knights and the evil wizard. He needs to beat level 3 in 11 exciting minigames.

name: Geminism
summary: Two twin sisters, Hirosoma Kikyou and Hirosoma Shinku, clash together in a nook of a midnight city. The fight is watched over by two mysterious men, Yamaga and Tsukishiro. Just what is at stake in their battle?

name: Gemini City: Science and Magic
summary: Fantasy otome visual novel included in the Story Me app.

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter - The Resistance Edition
Geometry Curling
summary: Geometry Curling is a game like curling, but using polygons/circles as pucks : move your polygons/circles close to the target, move closer than computer's one! Besides battling with computer, you may also watch 2 computers playing together!

name: Gem Defense
summary: Build Gem towers and fight off the sneaky dwarves from escaping. Combine Gems to construct secret special Gems and construct mazes to make escaping difficult for the dwarves! Beware the flying bats that fly over your maze!

name: Gex Trilogy
summary: Gex Trilogy is the definitive edition of the classic platforming series with Gexcessive attitude, complete with Gextras like rewind and save anywhere. Relive Gex's snark-laced adventures through the warped lens of twentieth-century pop culture and use your Gexterity to survive an onslaught of television-themed challenges.

name: Genesis of Descent
summary: A large map for the original Doom that uses a huge amount of scripting and ZDoom features while attemptimg to retain classic and fast paced Doom action.

summary: Pack offers three strategic modules: Medic, Scavenger, and Spotter. Also, advanced armor such as Ballistic Plates, Concussive Plates, and Fire Retardant Insulation. Plus, enjoy 11 cosmetic options for your Companion.

summary:
Geo Gods is a solo card game which combines card drafting with a simple tile placing mechanic.
In Geo Gods you use the elemental magic of the Gods to create a godly garden. Each God faction comes with its own set of cards which you can strategically use to increase the score of each God. Activate the 6 elemental Power Crystals to gain even more score and create the perfect garden.

name: Geotrion
summary: Geotrion uses the GPS feature of your mobile device to figure out your location. The objective of the game is to form a triangle with other geotrion players. The larger the triangle you form, the more points you’ll score.

name: Get Slapped!
summary: Get Slapped! is a 3rd person slap-stick action comedy fighting game with mind-bending arenas, where you can combat eccentric foes, and climb the ranks to face off against even more ruthless fighters. Prepare to showcase your slap skills like never before!

name: Gearbits
summary: Fast paced mecha themed third person shooter.

name: Germline
summary: Germline invites you to a post-apocalyptic world. In this new world, humanity is facing complete extinction. Now stand up, put on your armor and weapons. Fight to avoid danger, because you are humanity's last hope.

name: George of the Jungle and the Search for the Secret
summary: Experience the thrilling adventures of George of the Jungle, a classic side-scrolling platformer reminiscent of Pitfall! As the fearless George, you'll navigate through a lush jungle environment, dodging hazards like mischievous monkeys and treacherous pits. Be careful, though - some obstacles can be deadly, so keep a sharp eye out for danger. But don't worry, George has got some tricks up his sleeve too! Swing from vines and collect precious eggs to boost your progress. Just remember to stay safe and have fun!

name: Gekihaden
summary: A unique side-scrolling shooting game in which all the graphics other than the background, such as your own plane and enemy planes, are written in kanji. Players use lock-on lasers and regular bullets to complete a total of 7 stages with a wide variety.

• …and more!

name: Gelatinous: Humanity Lost
summary: Gelatinous is a platforming adventure with deep roots in games like Mega Man, Metroid, Castlevania, and other classics.

name: George McGeehan Gamer Hero
summary: George McGeehan wants to save a cat! Play this chill platformer by jumping up onto light fixtures and avoid annoying enemies!

name: Gears of Babies: Browser
summary:
Gears of Babies : Browser is a fun third person shooter with an action hero baby protagonist.

The story of the game is about a baby who wants to take away his milk and diapers.

name: Geode Climb
summary: Control the Geode Climbers born in the underground and aim for the surface in this jumping action game. You can only jump. Control the direction and strength to climb up.

name: Geko: In Search of the Big Fly
summary: Geko is a friendly gecko with a delightful goal: catching the big fly to ensure a delicious meal! To help him on this thrilling adventure, you'll jump, climb platforms, dodge obstacles, and defeat enemies that appear along the way.

name: Gears of Dragoon: Fragments of a New Era
summary: Join a young explorer delving into the labyrinth beneath Carnas, a city pulsating with magic yet whispering of a mechanical past. As echoes of a bygone era stir, the ancient gears of fate rumble awake.

name: Get Them Boats: Orca Revenge
summary: You are an orca, a killer whale, out for revenge against the elites mucking up your waters. Attack the rudders, and eat the rich!

name: Geometric Paradox TD
summary: Geometric Paradox TD - a fast paced tower defense with minimalistic graphics but complex mechanics. Build towers, choose the correct upgrades, think fast and defeat those nasty shapes! Are you ready to use your strategic and creative thinking to stop the paradox?

name: Gensei Fukyo Den
summary:
Gensei Fūkyō Den is a Japanese RPG with a somewhat "light" approach, both in story-telling and gameplay. The gameplay mostly follows the standard procedure of Japanese-style RPGs, although some features are simplified: there is no "world map", and town navigation is menu-based. Most of the gameplay consists of navigating maze-like top-down dungeons, fighting random enemies in turn-based first-person perspective combat. Characters use special points (SP) for powerful attacks and magic points (MP) for spells.

Released through Disc Station Vol. 4 in 1994 for PC-9801.

name: Gensei Kitan: Disc Saga III
summary: The player navigates Smash and his friends through top-down locations, talking to people and fighting randomly appearing enemies in hostile areas. The turn-based battles are viewed from a side perspective. Characters can execute various "techniques", which deplete TP (technique points), or magic spells.

name: Gensei Kaito Den
summary:
Gensei Kaitō Den is set in the same world as Gensei Kitan. Important characters from Gensei Kitan (including its protagonist, the dog Smash) appear in the game, and some of them are playable. However, the main hero is a young and very ambitious thief named Ali-Baba - who is, naturally, the leader of a band of 40 robbers. The game is divided into chapters; each one describes an episode from Ali-Baba's "career", from train robbery to treasure hunt and even discovery of the magic lamp .

The game is a humorous "light" Japanese-style RPG - there is no world map, and most of the time the hero is taken to a new location automatically. Many locations have simple puzzles to solve, and some dungeon areas are maze-like. The gameplay system is nearly identical to that of Gensei Kitan, with the same interface and overall structure. Random enemies are fought in turn-based style, on a side-view battle screen. Characters use physical attacks, special techniques, and magical spells. As in all Gensei games, HP, SP, and MP are fully restored by level up.

name: Gensei Torimonocho

8 different type of monsters are waiting to haunt you and eat your food. Disaster!

Unlock better weapons, and fight protecting your burgers!

Shoot them up, and try to survive all 20 nights!

Get Out Of My Store! is an arcade inspired top-down shooter where the objective is to survive enemy raids and get to the end. Every night is more difficult than the last, and new wacky monsters keep appearing until the very end.

Can you survive all the nights? Refine your abilities, beat your hi-score, and triumphantly defend your store!

The player must aim a pill to hit frowning faces until they smile; if the pill hits the same face too many times, it will disturbingly "die" and turn into a skull. A VT368 hack of the game was also produced (under the same name). Later re-published by Waixing; the Waixing version uses a weirdly off-putting rendition of the theme to Gentlemen of Fortune, a Soviet comedy film.

When Doctor Zora comes to Earth seeking to unseal her master Kaiser Hades and take over the planet, the Justirisers are assembled to stop her and her minions.

Forge deep connections with your comrades and guardian beasts. The stronger the bond, the more the guardian beasts unleash their power, enhancing collaboration with allies. The strength of these bonds can even influence the course of in-game events.

summary: Explore a huge mine to find ores, metals and gems and make your fortune. Sell your discoveries to buy upgrades and dig even deeper down. Be careful not to get stuck, fall down chasms or be crushed by rockfalls.

Explore the enchanting realm of Gears Forever, an exquisite 3D ball-rolling platformer brimming with imaginative challenges. Accumulate points with a simple swipe of your finger. Race against the clock while gathering gears across an endless realm spread across three distinct worlds!

name: GeoMaze

name: Genius Supernatural Romance
summary: Enjoy sizzling-hot and dangerously spicy stories of romance with devils, grim reapers and immortals! Make exciting decisions throughout the story to enjoy your very own unique experience! These are 3 of our best supernatural romance titles for you to enjoy as a bundle with reduced costs! Who will you choose to be your supernatural lover...?

name: Gears of War 2: All Fronts Collection
summary: This content pack features all 19 downloadable Gears 2 multiplayer maps and a bonus deleted single-player chapter, "Road to Ruin," from the Gears of War 2 campaign. For multiplayer fans, this pack brings together the complete set of Gears 2 multiplayer maps: Allfathers Garden, Canals, Courtyard, Flood, Fuel Depot, Fuel Station, Gold Rush, Gridlock, Grind Yard, Highway, Mansion, Memorial, Nowhere, Sanctuary, Subway, Tyro Station, Under Hill, War Machine, and Way Station—everything in the Flashback, Combustible, Snowblind, and Dark Corners downloadable packs combined

name: Gemz
summary: Immerse yourself in the fast-paced world of Gemz, where your shield stands as the last line of defense against advancing gemstones. Use precise control to block and smash gems, collecting powerups, coins, and facing off against mini-bosses along the way. As time ticks away, the gems intensify in speed, testing your reflexes and strategic thinking. Combine powerups for ultimate survival as you strive for the highest score and become the ultimate Gemz master!

name: Gears of War 2: Flashback Map Pack
summary:
The Flashback Map Pack is the first downloadable content pack (DLC) for the 2008 game Gears of War 2. It came bundled with all new copies of Gears of War 2 at launch. It later became available for purchase for 400 Microsoft points. The third and final way to have it is to own the Gears of War Triple Pack (which includes the original Gears of War and Gears of War 2 + GoW2 DLC).

Flashback offers five tweaked multiplayer maps from the original Gears of War: Canals, Gridlock, Mansion, Subway, and Tyro Station; each of which was compatible with Horde mode.

name: Gears of War 2: Combustible Map Pack
summary: The Combustible Map Pack is the second downloadable content pack (DLC) for the 2008 game Gears of War 2. It includes three new fiery and explosive maps: Flood, Gold Rush, and Fuel Station.

name: Gears of War 2: Snowblind Map Pack
summary: The Snowblind Map Pack is the third downloadable content pack (DLC) for the 2008 game Gears of War 2. It includes four maps to play on, all with a winter-time theme. Two of these, Fuel Depot and Courtyard, are winterized remakes from previous Gears Of War maps. The other two, Underhill and Grind Yard, are completely new.

name: Georg Glaxo
summary: Georg Glaxo is a promotional game released by the Danish subsidiary of pharmaceutical company Glaxo. It's a side scrolling platform shooter where the player takes control of Georg, a boy who has asthma. The game consists of four levels, each representing one of the seasons of the year. In each level the young boy will come across various animals that he can dodge or shoot at. Some of these, like sharks, are direct dangers while others just affects Georg's asthma. If it gets too bad he will get sick, start to cough and move slower. However this can be prevented by taking the right medicine. There are three different kinds of medicine, Flixotide (orange), Serevent (green) and Ventoline (blue). The orange and green should be taken every morning and evening, while the blue one is taken when Georg gets sick. A green, yellow and orange meter shows the current condition. If the marker is within the green area everything is okay.

name: Gensou Sekai: Eastland Saga
summary:
Reimu travels alone at first, but new heroines can be obtained as the player progresses through the game's story by exploring the game world and defeating opponents.
The battle system is turn-based with the protagonists and antagonists on different sides of the battlefield, using various commands such as: attack, magic, heal, defend and run.

name: GeoGrid
summary:
GeoGrid is a daily trivia game made to put your geography knowledge to the test!

Guess a country for each box in the board that matches the criteria specified by the box's row and column categories. Each box on any given board has anywhere from 5 to 30 unique answers. A new game board is generated each day at 12am EST.

Players have 10 guesses to fill out the grid, but can enable infinite mode for unlimited.
A country can only be guessed once per game board.

name: Gene Rain Ultimate & Your Toy Bundle
summary:
Two great games in one pack!
Gene Rain Wind Tower: Ultimate Edition: control a human resistance army in game, fighting to end the conficts afflicting the whole world. The Ultimate Edition includes the 4K UHD reworked Gene Rain base game, Sky City Rebirth DLC, and Way to Heaven DLC.

Your Toy: Do you rememver your childhood toy? Where are they? They were your friend, ever, but can you imagine how they will be your nightmare for now? A popular 3D first person puzzle adventure game is now on sale!

name: Gender Neutral Chess
summary: A chess variant where you can transform pieces on the fly to add excitement to the classic game.

name: Geras
summary: "Geras" is a psychological horror game that explores themes of aging, mortality, and the fear of the unknown, with its haunting atmosphere and storytelling, But beware - in the world of "Geras" not everything is as it seems, and the line between reality and nightmare blurs with each passing moment.

name: Generality 4
summary: This pack has a little bit of everything, although it's mostly focused on QoL features and basic tech mods. The main idea, much like the rest of the Generality series, is to feel like its own game, totally separate from Minecraft.

name: Genshin Impact: An Everlasting Dream Intertwined
summary:
Version 4.7 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Clorinde, Sigewinne and Sethos
• New main story quest: Chapter IV: Act VI - Bedtime Story
• New story quests for Clorinde and Sigewinne
• New gameplay mode: Imaginarium Theater
• New quality of life features
• New main event: Mutual Security Enhancing Simulation
• …and more!

name: Geki Kuukan Pro Baseball: At the End of the Century 1999
summary: Gekikuukan Pro Baseball: The End of the Century 1999 is a Sports game, developed and published by SquareSoft, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Gem of Destiny
summary: [Gema do Destino] is a magical MMORPG with a wide world view and cool content featuring various dungeons and classic PVP experiences. As an MMORPG game, this game has incredible scene images with cool effects that give players a complete gaming experience.

name: Gem Hunter
summary:
“Gem Hunter” (Cazador de gemas) is an MMORPG game that combines combat, gathering, farming and social interaction in one, with a variety of game mechanics and a classic PVP experience. Here you will find charming characters within a super adorable and romantic anime-style virtual world.

Defeat terrible “Bosses” to raise your level and unlock extravagant abilities, also get the company of a faithful “Companion”, cute “Streales”, legendary “Gods” and among others. You can also create or join a guild for a more interactive and exciting adventure with other players.

name: Get Up In The Night
summary: "Get Up In The Night" tells a sci-fi story set in the future, filled with dark humor. An old man wakes up in a completely unfamiliar place... His bladder can no longer hold, and he must rush to the bathroom! But what exactly is going on? What secrets are hidden within all this?

name: Geminism
summary: Two pairs of twins war for love, life, and limb beneath the curtain of a dark Tokyo night. From the artisans at CRAFTWORK comes a visual novel lush with art, action, and mystery; a story of GEMINISM—deformity and divinity.

name: Get Tilted! :)
summary: Tilt and jump your way out of the depths of a grand city. A difficult game where falling is your biggest obstacle, get used to starting over. Don't get too tilted :)

name: Get off Work
summary: After coming home from work, the usual atmosphere is different. Suddenly, someone appears and starts giving you terrifying and strange tasks.

name: Gelatina is Hungry
summary: A hungry slime from Outer Space wreaks havoc throughout the Universe! Control Gelatina and plow through the world eating everything you can. The more you eat, the more you’ll grow. How far will your hunger take you?

name: Gears of War: E-Day
summary:
Experience the brutal horror of Emergence Day through the eyes of Marcus Fenix in the origin story of one of gaming's most acclaimed sagas.​
Fourteen years before Gears of War, war heroes Marcus Fenix and Dom Santiago return home to face a new nightmare: the Locust Horde. These subterranean monsters, grotesque and relentless, erupt from below, laying siege on humanity itself. ​
Built from the ground up with Unreal Engine 5, Gears of War: E-Day delivers unprecedented graphical fidelity.

name: Generation Exile
summary: Generation Exile is a turn-based city-builder taking place aboard a generation starship where instead of extracting more and more natural resources to meet your populace’s needs, you only have what you brought with you. Rebuild the ship’s fragile ecosystems before the ship reaches the end of its journey. Procedurally generated characters and storylines mean that every journey — spanning several hundred years — will be uniquely yours.

name: Getting There
summary: Getting There is a narrative adventure game telling the story of the world after what is only known as The Collision. After the death of her lover Kirsten, Lauren gets in her van and journeys across the strange and quiet world in search of civilisation.

name: Genso Manège
summary: Follow Emma as she fights to reawaken her magical powers in order to aid a unique cast of characters, all of whom are trapped inside a travelling amusement park. Having lost memories from youth, Emma must rediscover her past through love and friendship in this stunning dream-like fantasy otome.

name: Get More Fries!
summary: "I'm a seagull, and I'm not just after your fries, I'm also gonna poop on humans! You guys better watch out!" This is a 3D game with some action elements

name: Generation Zero: Heavy Weapons Pack
summary:
Become the Hollywood action hero that Östertörn deserves!

Grab your bandana, rip off your sleeves, and unleash mayhem on your mechanical foes with four lethal high-caliber weapons that are sure to get your adrenaline pumping.

name: Gen.loss
summary:
A Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 8.

Control Yamitsuki as she wanders a melancholy dreamscape. Learn more about her past and deep-set fears.

name: Genshin Impact: Summertide Scales and Tales
summary:
Version 4.8 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Emilie
• New limited-time area: Simulanka
• New story quest for Emilie
• New outfits for Nilou and Kirara
• New quality of life features
• New main event: Summertide Scales and Tales
• …and more!

name: Gears Unchained: The Rise of Revolution
summary: In a futuristic city under dictatorship, a brave mechanic with an illegal electronic arm rises up against the dictator. Face dangers, unravel intrigues and overcome deadly obstacles, approaching an epic final showdown.

name: Geometry Dabs: Save the World
summary: Geometry Dabs, a dangerous drug, has brainwashed countless individuals into becoming mindless slaves for its creator, RopTob. The exact purpose of RopTob's control over these victims remains unclear, but it surely cannot be anything good. Your goal is to rescue these people from RopTob

name: Getaway Grand Prix
summary: Swipe gems and escape the law as a Getaway driver in a thrill ride of HIGH-SPEED MOTOR HEIST MADNESS!

name: Genshin Impact: Flowers Resplendent on the Sun-Scorched Sojourn
summary:
The fourth major update of Genshin Impact, known as Version 5.0, which includes:
• New characters: Mualani, Kinich, and Kachina
• New region, Natlan
• New gameplay mechanics: Saurian Indwelling and Nightsoul’s Blessing
• New main story quests: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Act I & II
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Gearbits: Raider Expedition
summary: Gearbits: Raider expedition is an expansion campaign for Gearbits. The campaign is a side-story, taking place after the end of Gearbits. The expansion features new missions and maps. A new cast of characters and new playable units.

name: Gensokyo: Presumption of Guilt - Pansies Before Dawn
summary: An ancient village, once sealed by yokais for a millennium, is now plagued by a series of bizarre yokai murders. Follow the protagonist as they delve into the investigation, unravelling the mysteries submerged in the history.

name: Get Rich
summary: "Get Rich" is a thrilling 2D roguelike shooter that plunges you into a corrupt metropolis teeming with danger and intrigue. Join the quest to get revenge and justice in a city riddled with corruption.

name: Gem Blast
summary: Mine gems on an infinite hex board. Play as a cute robot stranded on an alien planet. Find ship parts to repair your broken space ship. Use markers and logic to find gems and avoid bombs. Skillful play lets you dig longer. Spend gems to upgrade Dig Bot. Unlock achievements for even more power!

name: Gentle Officer
summary: Take on the role of an officer into whose hands an indomitable spy has fallen. Expose the Agent by any legal or illegal means.

name: GeoRunner
summary:
You are a member of the Blit Rescue and Tracking Squad (BRATS). Your unit's mission is to rescue Blit whenever he gets captured, which is basically his job. Blit skateboards, crashes, and ends up in a cage. In order to free Blit, you must find a number of keys scattered across different countries in a region. To obtain the keys, the game tests your geographical knowledge.

GeoRunner prompts you to select a region of the world (North & Central America, South America, Africa, etc.) and to configure a skill level. The skill level determines a number of settings:* The difficulty of the clues. Early levels simply tell the player to visit a certain country. Later levels challenge the player on capitals or even trivia related to the country.

name: Gensou Ningyou Embu Gaiden: Yuki-chan no Shugyou
summary:
Based on the Touhou Puppet Dance Performance, the game focuses on combat with Yuki as the main character.
Using a party of prepared dolls, the player takes on NPCs who, unlike in the main game, are more human-like in this puzzle-like mini-game.

name: Geometry Shooter
summary: Geometry shooter is an arcade game that is simple to start but hard to master - shoot the cannon to break objects in the screen, but beware - each ball you shoot will expand into a new object!

name: Get Down
summary: Get Down to the deepest point, to this Game's Creator, to RESET his gone wrong game world and save its NPCs. WHY YOU? Because only the file called Player can execute the reset button. BUT NOTE: If you fall, there's no saving.

name: Getaway Girls
summary: Getaway Girls is the first and only book of the Getaway Girls series.

name: Geo-Political Simulator 5
summary: The new evolution of Geopolitical Simulator series, the hyperrealistic simulator of today's world! em geopolitical simulator 5 , play as the Head of State ou CEO de uma compania and extend your influence around the globe. By playing as several countries, try to change the destiny of our planet with orchestrated actions.

name: Geomancers
summary: Geomancers is a PVP card game turn-based shooter where you command powerful elemental magic from a wide array of spells of your own choosing to destroy and create terrain, manipulate your mana and spells, or even summon powerful creatures to fight by your side.

name: GeographyHelp
summary:
GeographyHelp is an educational quiz-based game focused on enhancing geography knowledge through interactive learning. The game offers a mix of single-player challenges and Twitch-integrated multiplayer modes designed to test users' ability to recognize countries and geographic features. The theme centers on world geography with a specific emphasis on helping users improve their skills in games like GeoGuessr.

Players engage in a variety of quiz categories that range from flags and country traits to unique geographic identifiers like road signs or language usage. The game features a resource database containing maps and visual aids to assist in learning and memorization. In the multiplayer modes, users can compete in real-time with friends or Twitch viewers making it an interactive experience for streamers and their audiences.

Quizzes are structured with a time limit adding an element of challenge as users are tasked with answering multiple-choice questions based on images or maps. With categories including bollards, license plates, and special letters the game provides a wide array of geography-focused topics. The inclusion of Twitch chat participation allows viewers to collectively take part in quizzes enhancing engagement for both the streamer and the audience

name: Genshin Impact: The Rainbow Destined to Burn
summary:
Version 5.1 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Xilonen
• New main story quests: Archon Quest, Chapter V - Acts III & IV
• New Tribal Chronicles quest: Children of Echoes - Act III
• New main event: Chromatic Ode of Candies and Roses
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Generic Fishing Game
summary:
Sit back and enjoy a peaceful afternoon on the lake, fishing while surrounded by nature. Catch over 3 different types of fish as you fill your entire Fishing Encyclopedia.

Try to get the biggest fish from the lake, but most importantly: have a nice, relaxing time.

name: Genesis
summary:
Have you ever wondered about the Mother of God?
In this loose retelling of the Gnostic Myth of Sophia, the story follows the Aeon Sophia, in their quest for love, adoration and forgiveness from the Holy Trinity. In their attempts of repentance, a chaotic call start to seed in their mind; and everything suddenly goes wrong.

name: Geezer Gus: The Meteorite Motel
summary: The Meteorite Motel is a surreal JRPG based upon the Geezer Gus franchise. Upon receiving news of an unidentified meteorite landing near the area, Gus makes his way to the crash site known as the Meteorite Motel. Among the loathsome and vile occupants of the motel lies a suspicious colony, who are interested in harnessing the meteorite's power. The player must navigate through the unpredictable and dangerous motel with the help of formidable allies in order the reach the meteorite first.

name: Get Baz Home
summary: Bizzare retro platformer featuring warped level design

name: Gears of War
summary: This expanded version for Windows added a new story Act, as well as new multiplayer maps.

name: Get To The Top
summary:
A challenging game about climbing various terrain areas using a pair of wire hooks.

You have to climb to the top using hooks.
Use the keyboard to move, and the mouse to control your hands and hooks (or gamepad if you are not in enough pain).
Only the most persistent will make it to the top.

name: Genesis Survivors
summary: Welcome, hackers, you're being transferred to Eden City to defend its citizens against the alien threat! Genesis Survivors is a single-player survivor-like auto-shooter where players must defeat hordes of alien invaders until the extraction time.

name: Gertie Goose
summary:
You are in control of GERTIE GOOSE.

• FOREST DEMONS have stolen your 8 eggs.

• Search the hidden forest locations for your lost eggs.

• Beat the MASTER DEMON by collecting most of your lost eggs.

name: Gengu Survival
summary: Survive on an open-world island with unlockable abilities that help you on your journey in Gengu Survival. Craft new items as you level up and build your own base wherever you want. But be aware, there is something strange on this island...

name: Geometry Shooter Pro
summary:
Geometry Shooter PRO takes the exciting foundation of the original Geometry Shooter and cranks it up to the next level! Jump into this hand-drawn arcade game where precision meets action.

Fire from a moving cannon at expanding geometric shapes like circles, squares, and triangles, all while mastering the art of perfect shots and crazy combos.

In this enhanced version, experience brand-new PVP and CO-OP modes, where you can team up or compete with friends for the ultimate score.

No more game-overs after a single mistake! Now you have 3 lives to keep the fun going! Plus, discover bonus balls with unique effects that add new layers of strategy..

Whether you're a fan of the original or a new player, Geometry Shooter PRO promises even more challenging and exciting gameplay. Can you master the art of the perfect shot?

name: Gensou Rouman Kikou: Phantasmagoria Trues
summary:
Gensou Rouman Kikou―Phantasmagoria Trues― ("Fantasy Romance Travel Log") is a Touhou fan game made by Len in Danmakufu. It is a remake of his earlier game Phantasm Romance, containing an overhauled game system, three game modes, and an extra stage.

The game spans six regular areas as well as three "unseen" areas which the player must unlock via special means. In addition to this, the game also contains a Terminus area which serves as a counterpart to the Extra stage in the main Touhou series.

The game's system revolves around a combination of factors, including a multiplier that is increased by items, bonuses caused by grazing, and a hyper system that duplicates point items and allows the player to cancel bullets into items. There is also a "simple" mode that works like Phantasm Romance, with the multiplier, graze and hyper system removed.

name: Genshin Impact: Tapestry of Spirit and Flame
summary:
Version 5.2 of Genshin Impact, which includes:

• New areas: Tezcatepetonco Range, Quahuacan Cliff, and Ochkanatlan

name: Get to Work
summary: You are poor and bald. Get to Work.

name: GenEi AP: Empty Heart
summary:
Travel through the world of Harumakigohan in a quest for music.

”What are you listening to, Mikage?”
Spica is looking for something to listen to, and Mikage, the protagonist, goes on a journey in a mysterious world to search for songs that will please her friend.

What’s behind that last door? What is that heartbeat you can hear?

name: G.E.A.R.
summary: A first person game with 2D, realistically simulated, physics-based puzzles.

name: Georgie-Yolkie
summary: Georgie-Yolkie is an all-new purrfect open-world platformer and collectathon! With huge, beautiful worlds, meet an unforgettable cast of silly characters!

name: Geometry Blaster
summary: Geometry Blaster is a Blaster game that teaches high school geometry.

name: Gemwielders
summary: In this competitive deckbuilding game you are a Gemwielder, capable of controlling an ancient artifact weapon. Socket mystical gems to acquire powerful abilities and prevail in a duel against another Gemwielder.

name: Gemerald
summary: Ongezellig themed mod for Half-Life.

name: Geneki Toudai-sei ga Tsukutta!: Dekiru Ko ni Naru Seikatsu Shuukan Dragon Sakura Youji-hen
GeckoShop
summary: Collect and sell geckos. Decorate and upgrade your shop. Chase Thieves. Explore the small open-world city, full of charm and life. Sell your lizards, or keep 'em as your Pets!

name: Genshin Impact: Moonlight Amidst Dreams
summary:
Version 5.4 of Genshin Impact, which includes:

name: General Warfare
summary: Climb the ranks in this fast paced card game.

name: Gear of Time
summary: It is an Isometric Dungeon Crawler with a few RPG elements in which the character must escape from a great tower after stealing the hourglass.

name: Geometry Genius: Shapes
summary: Geometry Genius: Shapes is a fun and educational game that challenges players with randomly generated geometry problems. Players identify the right shape by choosing one of three possible answers. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for sharpening geometry skills in a quick, engaging format!

name: Gemporium
summary: Mine, Refine and Sell Gemstones of various rarities to eagerly awaiting customers in Gemporium, a casual mining simulation management game. Keep your finances in check as you juggle a growing gem emporium while simultaneously paying off a generational debt. There's only so much time in the day!

name: Gelluloid Domination
summary: Gelluloid Domination is a fast-paced strategy game of fantasy biology. Start with a single fragile cell and expand across the network, assimilating rivals to grow your gel-powered army. Evolve mutations, unlock new abilities, and outmaneuver deadly pathogens. Adapt and conquer, expand or be consumed. Every decision shapes the network — will you achieve total domination?

name: Generation Zero: Action Hero Bundle
summary: Become the ultimate Resistance fighter with the Action Hero Bundle.

name: Generation Zero: Starter Pack Bundle
summary: This bundle includes the most essential weapons and equipment for new Resistance fighters.

name: GeoJet
summary: Blast through neon courses, dodging obstacles and grabbing power-ups in this intense arcade racer. Chain combos and hit the finish line with the highest score!

name: Geppetto
summary: Geppetto is an online virtual world full of digital games and fun activities for children and teenagers to learn english at their own pace, with adaptive technology and artificial intelligence.

name: Geppetto 2
summary: Imagine transforming a classroom into a virtual world full of adventures and discoveries. With Geppetto 2, your students can now immerse themselves in an entirely new experience, full of features that combine fun and learning in an innovative way.

name: Gemmy's Adventure
summary: Simple but not easy! Gemmy's Adventure is a casual action game. All you need to do is move a mouse to reach the finish line without touching any traps, objects and walls. Levels get harder, requiring strategy to pass.

name: Get Out School
summary: "GET OUT SCHOOL" is a horror adventure game about campus bullying. The game character, on her way home, encounters a strange event that transports her to a different high school in another time and space. As a student there, what will she face? Discover in the game!

name: George Likes to Hide
summary: You have 60 seconds to find George as many times as you can.

name: Gem Jam
summary: A fun gem collecting puzzle game

name: Genesis
summary: Play as a new god learning to create your own planets in this deck building strategy game! Create interaction engines with tiles and utilize the powers of the cosmos to help you stabilize your planet while it approaches maturity.

name: Geometry Madness
summary: So you were at home (obviously at Geometry Island, who doesn't know that?) and suddenly... A GIANT SPACESHIP that looks like a triangle FALLS down your world. Shapes are invading and destroying your friend's island, EVERY 5 ISLAND. So you decide to save your world, risking your life at all costs, passing in each island without fear, figthing upon fear. And how's that going to end?? You don't know.

name: Getting a Bottle of Water Simulator
summary: The title is pretty self-explanatory. Get the bottle of water.

name: Gender Dysphoria
summary: Gender Dysphoria is a Psychological/Body Horror that is a visual and audible representation of my personal experience of dealing with it.

name: Genshin Impact: Day of the Flame's Return

• New main event: Tournament of Glory in Bloom
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Get Away From The Cube
summary: Get away from the cube before it touches you.

name: GeoGuessr: Steam Edition
summary: Explore the world with GeoGuessr Steam Edition! Compete against others, climb divisions, and prove your geography skills. Travel to stunning locations, analyze clues, and make your best guess.

name: Get Out: A "Very Bad Dreams" Story
summary:
Ever felt trapped in a nightmare?
GET OUT! is here to plunge you into the craziest VR horror experience on PSVR2!
Inspired by 80s retro horror, this "popcorn" game is all about survival, thrills, and pure fun.
As a wise adventurer once said, "Survive, Survive, Survive. And occasionally, Run!"
Are you ready to face your fears? See you in the game!

name: Get a Midnight Snack without Mom Knowing
summary: Find delicious food in the dark kitchen. But you have to move as carefully as possible. My mom may wake up.

name: Get a Body Language Expert, Pronto!
summary: A body language expert simulator where you analyze videos brought to you by clients.

name: Gekko Episode of Yurihime
summary: In a stage where swords, machines, and ponytails appear in modern society A school love comedy visual novel in which you can enjoy a love story This is the third installment of the Gekko series. In this work, you can enjoy the love story of “Yurihime,” the protagonist's older sister and teacher.

name: Geo-Deux
summary:
Lead a band of angels on a quest to find Jesus and save Christmas from hyper-secularization. Dress those angels up in the latest fashions, including but not limited to khakis, polo shirts, dreadlocks, hotpants, mohawks, and many more.

Collect many instruments along the way, each with a unique play style, and use them to dissemble inanimate objects through the power of sound. Never forget your cosmic origins! Walk the line between fantasy and reality in a world that really is out to get you.

Geo-Deux is the long-awaited sequel to Geo-Duck, a 2d musical platformer from the pioneering glitch-hop duo Your Infamous Harp. Based to some extent on a true story, and featuring a lovable cast of characters that were personally trained, housed and fed by the developers.

name: Get Yoked: Extreme Bodybuilding
summary: GET YOKED is a Roguelike, Deckbuilder game about becoming an ABSOLUTE UNIT.

name: Geyserlands
summary: Geyserlands is a deck-building game of modern otherworldly mystery. Gain new cards and upgrade your deck as you explore the mystery of Geyserlands. Unlock secret powers and gain special advantages. How will your story end in Geyserlands?

name: Genshin Impact: Paralogism
summary:
Version 5.6 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Escoffier and Ifa
• New main story quest: "Interlude Chapter: Act IV - Paralogism"
• New story quest for Escoffier
• New main event: Whirling Waltz
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Gear Up Einstein!
summary: Assemble your dream team of historical heroes, gear them up and save the world !

name: Geo Challenge
summary: Geo Challenge takes you on a tour around the world as you put your geography knowledge to the test! You and your friends can prove once and for all who knows the most countries, flags and cities of the world.

name: Getting Around It with Pheasant Birdy
Geppaku: Monogatari
summary:
"Congratulations, if you're reading this, you're oficially nominated, present yourself in the City of spirits's three houses to keep up"

Third and last entry in the "Time traveler" trilogy, created by Commodorette. Mediums, the ones born with a psychic skill superior to those of the ordinary population, they're few, hidden among ordinary people, why? Only they know that. It's common knowledge that these people are the target of this world's protective deities, who search and choose them as helpers, if they're chosen, they'll live in servitude and with the honors of the deity who called them. Homever, from the summoning to being oficially a "Medium", there's an inmense gap, so the term "Nominated" is also used for them.

Mizuno Mai, 16, receives a letter informing her that she's been nominated to become a medium, despite not being interested in the offer, she decides to go to the adress anyways.

name: Gears of War: Reloaded
summary: The original Gears of War returns, faithfully remastered and natively optimized for more platforms than ever before as Gears of War: Reloaded. Experience the origins of one of gaming’s most acclaimed franchises like never before. Featuring 4K resolution, up to 120 FPS support, and the ultimate multiplayer experience with cross-progression and cross-play, across all platforms, this is the definitive way to experience the game that started it all.

name: Georgie-Yolkie 64: The Furry Tale
summary: Let's tell an old tale anew, and go back to the good ol' days of gaming with a new classic, hack and slash adventure. Upgrade Georgie & Yolkie's abilities and travel across 17 lovely lands and save Princess Tabitha from the clutches of the evil King Rattie! Lots of addictive swordplay and fun here!

name: Gemstones Rush Mania
summary: Gemstones Rush Mania is a fast-paced puzzle game where you drop square gemstones into four columns, aiming to align and clear full rows for points. The closest row to the player must be perfectly aligned to disappear, triggering combos if rows below are also aligned. Occasionally, wooden blocks appear, requiring two hits to break before the row can be cleared. As the game progresses, the speed increases, making it more challenging. How long can you keep up, and what high score can you achieve?

name: Get 0ut
summary: A puzzle-solving horror game about a broken father with an unknown past who finds himself in a never-ending cycle, trying to find the answers to his old life, guided by an unknown hand.

name: Getting Goopy
summary: Getting Goopy is a puzzle platformer where you can slide, jump, and shoot goo to solve various puzzles.

name: German Tantei-dan Maringumi: Himitsu Kichi wo Mamore!
Gelecard: Guerreiros Gelatinosos
summary: Gelecard: Gelatinous Warriors is a fun card game featuring the adorable SLIMES! These cute little creatures are ready to wreak havoc on the game boards.

name: General Command
summary: General Command is a turn-based Napoleonic war game. Create custom battles and lead your army against enemy generals who set their strategy based on aggression and confidence. In the age of muskets, cavalry charges, and cannon fire, use bold battlefield maneuvers to seize victory.

name: General Idler
summary: Build an unstoppable army and conquer the world one country at a time in this strategic idle game. Train troops, upgrade tech, and dominate neighboring nations using population, area, and borders to plan your path to global control.

name: Gem Miner TD
summary: Mine. Maze. Merge. Survive. Dig for powerful gems, merge them into game-breaking towers, and pick roguelike perks to build wild synergies in this vibrant 2D pixel art roguelike tower defense. Do not let enemies drag your miner to the lava!

name: Genshin Impact: A Space and Time for You
summary:
Version 5.7 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Skirk and Dahlia
• New main story quest: "A Space and Time for You"
• New story quest for Skirk
• New endgame mode: Stygian Onslaught
• New main event: Battle of Imagined Arrays
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: GeTrix
summary: Stack, swipe, and wave your way through a fast-paced puzzle challenge powered by intuitive hand-tracking controls.

name: Gen-Abyss
summary: The thriller horror mystery RPG. Influencer Feng Cimu witnesses her crew vanish one by one. As sinister phenomena relentlessly emerge, her descent into the mountain's secrets unravels a shocking conspiracy—while buried truths about her own past and identity begin clawing their way to the surface...

name: Geminum
summary: Geminum is a narrative-driven sci-fi anthology.By the year 3000, Earth has entered the Cryocene.Surface temperatures have plummeted below -150°C, leaving humanity with a harrowing choice: seek shelter in underground bunkers, or venture into the vast unknown aboard deep-space colony ships.

name: Gemz Burst
summary: Gemz Burst puts you in control of a high-speed ship orbiting a deadly space zone. Fire toward the center to break spinning rings of energy gems and expose the turret core at the heart of the chaos. Time your shots and dodge incoming fire as you blast through each layer of danger in this intense outer-ring shooter.

name: Germ Blasters
summary: Help clear the the germs with meds using different directions.

name: Genshin Impact: Sunspray Summer Resort
summary:
Version 5.8 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New character: Ineffa
• New main story quest: Song of the Welkin Moon Prelude, "The Journey Home"
• New outfits for Yelan and Bennett
• New main event: Sunspray Summer Resort
• New quality of life features
• …and more!

name: Gears & Goo
summary: Control an army of Sodarians in a battle for territory and Sodalite domination. Command your workers to gather resources, man turrets, and send out waves of quirky troops as you strategically place spells and unleash chaos on the battlefield. Build your base, unlock exciting new units, and watch the mayhem unfold as your miniature Sodarian armies clash with the Oozers.

name: Geodyssey
summary: Geodyssey is a mind-bending first-person adventure game that challenges your perception with confusing environments. Explore spaces that defy logic and experience a reality that cannot exist. Immerse in a Non-Euclidean world that you cannot wrap your head around.

name: Genshin Impact: A Dance of Snowy Tides and Hoarfrost Groves
summary:
The fifth major update of Genshin Impact, also known as Version "Luna I" and "Song of the Welkin Moon: Segue". This update includes:
• New characters: Lauma, Flins and Aino
• New region, Nod Krai
• New main story quests: "A Dance of Snowy Tides and Hoarfrost Groves" and "Elegy of Dust and Lamplight"
• New main event: Clink Clank Clash
• 5th anniversary celebrations, new QoL, and more!

name: Gemion Function
summary: A fast-paced, team-based fighting game using 2.5D graphics with smooth online play via GGPO rollback netcode. With a teammate, it will be vital to manage the shared resource for super meter for EX Special Moves, Burst, and other team mechanics.

name: Gentleman's Proposal
summary: Can’t find the right groom? You're headed for an arranged marriage with a rich old man! But suddenly, four irresistible suitors appear in your life... Could one of them be your way out? Set in the glamorous 19th-century English social scene, where romance and passion are never far away, you must navigate thrilling encounters as a strong, bold young woman. Can you find your 'perfect proposal' before time runs out?

name: Get Out of the Woods
summary: Life is easier when you're a small creature on a farm. Everything is decided for you, and your fate is written out until the very end. Sounds like a fairy tale... or maybe a nightmare? Enjoy the peaceful times. You'll never leave it, because you're safe here... Or are you?

name: GeneBreak
summary: A brutal first-person survival horror set in a Soviet apartment complex after a secret lab explosion. Minimal inventory, no pause — just survive what should not exist.

name: Get It Up!
summary: Can you make it to the top while balancing the stick on your head?ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ...probably not. It's pretty hard.

name: Get in Timelessness
summary: A psychological horror about a man who, by the will of fate — or a joke of chance — had to face the unthinkable. Sometimes a person looks into the abyss. Sometimes the abyss looks at you. And sometimes... She turns out to be Hungry.

name: Generic Fighter Maybe
summary: Generic Fighter Maybe is a traditional-style, 4-button, side-view fighting game for 2 players. Featuring all the classic fundamental fighting game mechanics, complete with big combos, multiple defensive mechanics, and meter management.

name: Genki Break!
summary: Genki Break! is a fast-paced 3D fighting game all about movement and stamina management!

name: Generic Idler
summary: Its an idle game, read the above You press the clicker button a few times and bam, you can now afford workers. What to do with it, see your idle coins RISE INTO THE SKY Eventually able to unlock combat, different items, skills and magic and much more The perfect game to sit on the second monitor

name: Geometry Factory
summary: Geometry Factory is a minimalist puzzle game. Use basic geometric elements such as points, lines, circles, etc. to build infinite possible graphics on the panel, complete the score goals in the exquisite level puzzles, and feel the beauty of geometry and mathematics.

name: Geamana Village
summary: A first-person investigative game set in a drowned village. Explore abandoned homes, speak with the last remaining locals, and capture through your lens the destruction left behind by the toxic sludge. Gather evidence, follow every clue, and uncover the truth hidden beneath silence and decay.

name: Gensou Gold Rush
summary: Rogue light shooting game based on Touhou Project!You can pick up reinforcement items by defeating enemies and progressing to a certain degree!Increase your firepower and defeat enemies as you go!

name: Geisterbahnhof
summary: Geisterbahnhof promises to deliver a chilling adventure, where every step into the unknown could be your last. Are you brave enough to face the darkness?

name: General Tactics: An Shi Rebellion
summary: In November 755, the An Shi Rebellion broke out, with most Tang Empire's cities falling to the rebels. You will be appointed as Military Governor of Shuofang to confront them. Form legions and strengthen your power to completely defeat the rebels.

name: Geargrid Tile Match
summary: Match tiles to keep the gears turning in Geargrid Tile Match, dive into a stunning steampunk world of puzzles, precision, and clockwork strategy. Can you clear the grid before the system jams?

name: GenesisScroll
summary: The story takes place in a village near Galur Castle. When the lost scroll reappears in the world, he will uncover the story from a long time ago, follow the guidance of the scroll, continuously learn magic, enhance strength, and challenge the aura of the strong!

name: Gecky The Deenosaur Stars In! Adventures In SunnyDoodle Swimmingland!
summary: It's Dyme To Start WackyDoodleing Around! Gecky The Deenosaur is Here! And He Needs Your Help To Find His Lost Pebble!

name: Gear Combination
summary: Gear Combination is a puzzle game where you combine gears of different sizes to reach a target rotation speed. Place gears freely and watch them spin together. Multiple quests can be played in any order and replayed. Simple yet strategic. Perfect for gear lovers.

name: Gemmiferous
summary: Gemmiferous is a fusion of Match-3 combat style and Roguelite Dungeon Crawler. Explore vast dungeons, assemble unique tile sets, uncover hidden treasures, discover powerful relics, fight long-forgotten creatures, and, most importantly, have fun doing so.

name: Get to the Sus Bus
summary: You will zoom past hordes of zombies, kill the ones you need to, and find keys to unlock passageways in this retro top-down shooter.

name: Gemstone Realm
summary: Explore unknown secret caves, successfully hunt monsters inside, and obtain various mysterious power hungry gems. These angry gems not only help us grow, but also have the opportunity to be exchanged for US dollars and fiat currency. Endless Adventure and Wealth - All in the Secret Gem Realm

name: Geimu Chagama Monogatari
summary: What makes this game unique is that you can choose whether to defeat your enemies or befriend them. The items you get will change depending on whether you attack and defeat enemies or befriend them by giving them food. You can also combine items to create "kusuri," items that change your actions and stats. With a "kusuri" you can overcome obstacles that would normally be impossible to overcome. The key to the strategy is what items you get to make the medicine, and whether you defeat or befriend your enemies in order to do so.

name: Geometry Breakers
summary: An arcade shoot 'em up retro-style game starring Captain Spike while destroying anti-matter geometric figures chimeras and their evil organization lead by General Complox.

name: Geckorientalism
summary: The game takes place in a fantasy world called Evelia, where the peaceful indigenous people, the elves, and the alien predators, the lizards, have fought a life-and-death battle. The story takes place after the war. Fortunately, the invaders failed to defeat the indomitable struggle of the elves

name: Genshin Impact: An Elegy for Faded Moonlight
summary:
Version "Luna II" of Genshin Impact, also known as "Song of the Welkin Moon: Reprise". This update includes:
• New characters: Nefer and Miliastra Wonderland's Manekin
• New main story quest: "An Elegy for Faded Moonlight"
• New main event: Ruins Exploration - Fieldwise Center
• New QoL, and more!

Additionally, this update also adds Miliastra Wonderland, a new gameplay mode centered around user-generated content.

name: Get the Guy
summary: A mysterious interface connects you to a troubled girl from an Eastern fantasy realm. Receive her words and visions instantly. Guide her choices through conscious labyrinths as your fates intertwine.

name: Get Them To Safety
summary: You play as a father trying to guide his children to safety through a terrifying, creature-infested world. You can command them to follow you or stay hidden, but every choice could mean life or death.

name: Genesis Relic: Idle Sandbox Simulator
summary: A sandbox idle management sim: pick the preset worlds “Three-Kingdoms Conquest” “The Golden Lotus” or “Famine Legend” then build and govern your own realm. The in-game editor lets you customize development rules, characters and plots, export your world, or load and share creations with others.

name: Gensou: Yumegokochi - Illusio: Dreamlike
summary: Free the Yōkai captured by the Supreme Leader!

name: GenTown
summary: GenTown is a web-based experience that allows the player to simulate a human-like civilization. The game's features include civil unrest, wars, revolutions, natural disasters, economies, and laws.

name: Get In Get Out
summary: Pixel-art judgment game about trust and paranoia. Interrogate arrivals, scan for symptoms, and make moral calls as a guard. Let them in, turn them away, or stop the threat. Randomized traits, scarce tools, authoritarian regime, multiple endings. Add to your wishlist!

name: Gearbound: Odyssey
summary: Gearbound: Odyssey is a vibrant 3D action-platformer where you blast, bash, and zip through alien worlds as rookie space cadet Ember, wielding over-the-top gadgets and gear on a galaxy-spanning journey to find her missing sister.

name: Get Colossal
summary: Giant robot arena brawler/party game with huge unit size differences and inertia/physics based combat. Slug it out as tiny humans and giant robots in fully destructible environments! Team up with friends and prove your ultimate badassery. Get smacked! Get EVEN! Get EVEN BIGGER! GET COLOSSAL!

name: Genshin Impact: A Nocturne of the Far North
summary:
Version "Luna III" of Genshin Impact, also known as "Song of the Welkin Moon: Interlude". This update includes:
• New characters: Durin and Jahoda
• New main story quests: "A Nocturne of the Far North" and "Melting Moonlight in the Morning Mist"
• New story quest for Durin
• New main event: Soulblazers' Snowbound Journey
• New system: Witch's Homework
• New updates for Miliastra Wonderland
• New QoL, and more!

name: Get Mazed
summary: GET MAZED is a 3D asymmetrical multiplayer game pitting survivors against opponents in procedurally generated mazes. Work together, obstruct your adversaries, and solve puzzles to escape before time runs out.

name: Geisha's Heart: Romance Among the Cherry Blossoms
Get Off Work
summary: JJXB is a pixel puzzle game with racing and puzzle elements. There are more than 100 levels inside, and players can also make their own levels and share them with others to play.

name: Gears Of Glory
summary:
Gears of Glory is a movement-based Tower Defense where you drive a van across the map to collect Gears, build powerful towers, and stop the robots from destroying your bases.

Developed for PC, Gears of Glory combines classic Tower Defense strategy with a unique twist: driving a stylish van through the chaos of a post-apocalyptic world.

Featuring a top-down pixel art look and fast-paced gameplay, the player takes on the role of a resistance pilot tasked with protecting the last human bases from hordes of robots that have taken over the planet and isolated humanity. To succeed, you’ll need skill behind the wheel, dodging obstacles or running enemies over. All while building towers with strategic synergies capable of turning the tide of battle.

Speed, strategy and survival collide in this game where every turn can mean the difference between extinction and the salvation of humanity.

The game’s inspiration comes from the desire to complement the Tower Defense genre and eliminate those idle moments where players would simply speed up the game after placing towers and wait. In Gears of Glory you are in constant motion driving the van to upgrade towers, collect Gears, and run enemies over.

The gameplay and art are influenced by titles such as Gemcraft, Kingdom Rush, Thronefall, Rock and Roll Racing, Biker Mice from Mars, GTA2.

name: Geckos & Deckos
summary: There are four lizards at this table, but only one pirate can leave victorious. Play your cards strategically and blow up your rivals. Don't forget to sling your tail at your friends' heads (because it's funny). Can you manage to take the helm?

name: Geo-Political Simulator 2026 Edition
summary:
Geopolitical Simulator – 2026 Edition is a simulation of our current world, recreating its features in-depth and across a number of domains: economic, political, military, social, financial, environmental, energetic, transportation…
Every country and major multinational corporation are represented with their own variables and functions. The calculation and scenario engines include more than 150,000 facts and figures, 20,000 texts, and 12 hours of recorded dialog. An ultra-detailed and animated 3D map with vegetation, bodies of water, every border, regions, production facilities, and important strategic sites around the world become your playground.

name: Geode
summary: In this top-down, multiplayer, co-op game, you must protect your Core Crystal by any means necessary. Build up your defenses, explore, refine, and upgrade to reach your goal. Play alone or with up to 8 people.

name: Gem Beasts
summary: Gem beasts is a creature collector, rogue-lite, where you become the leader of your own crystal clan. Fight and collect other creatures to play as, and explore different build combinations between their abilities.

name: Get'Trump'ed Trivia
summary: Get'Trump'ed, the ultimate trivia showdown where Donald Trump's larger-than-life persona takes center stage!

name: Getting Over It with Your Body
summary: You must learn to control your body, embrace the pain, endure the agony, reach the goal by any means necessary, and overcome the challenges together with your very own flesh!!!

name: Genesis
summary: Explore the sci-fi world of NeoGenesis, set in 2060, where interplanetary travel meets human ambition. Experience a gripping 2-hour story-driven adventure with dynamic AI-powered NPCs that respond to your choices.

name: Genesis
summary: A first-person survival horror set in an abandoned village. Scavenge notes, ammo, and supplies while being relentlessly hunted by a terrifying monster.

name: GET OUT!
summary: Ever felt trapped in a nightmare? GET OUT! is here to plunge you into the craziest VR horror experience on PSVR2! Inspired by 80s retro horror, this "popcorn" game is all about survival, thrills, and pure fun. As a wise adventurer once said, "Survive, Survive, Survive. And occasionally, Run!"

name: get in the hole
summary: A game about shoving things into a hole. As you progress, unlock new things to put in the hole, helpers to push more stuff into the hole, and upgrades to make your pusher longer and stronger.

name: Geon
summary: Geon is a turn-based JRPG set in a not so distant future where the past is seemingly forgotten; ruled by the supreme overlord only known as "George". Discover ancient history and uncover mysteries as you are forced to face George and fight to save the world from strange things from beyond the stars.

name: Gear.Club Unlimited 3
summary: The Gear.Club series is back! Customize and set up your favourite cars to race at top speed along the roads of the French Mediterranean coast and Japan. Don't just win – show off your style!

name: Geo IQ World Master
summary: Guess the world. Learn the world. Master the map. Discover new countries, cities, and landmarks!

name: Genshin Impact: A Traveler on a Winter's Night
summary:
Version "Luna IV" of Genshin Impact, also known as "Song of the Welkin Moon: Postlude". This update includes:
• New characters: Columbina, Zibai, and Illuga
• New area: The Lament of the Cliff-Shadowed Hollow
• New main story quests: "A Traveler on a Winter's Night" and "True Moon"
• New outfits for the Travelers, Neuvillette, and Yaoyao
• New main event: A Lanternlit Ode to the Silver Moon
• New updates for Miliastra Wonderland
• New QoL, and more!

name: GenDino
summary: GenDino was an experimental AI remix of the classic Chrome Dino game that was available for a limited time only.

name: Geo Land: The Dream Traveler Remastered
summary: A classic turn-based RPG with Zelda-like puzzles, where the line between dreams and reality begins to blur.

name: Gemini Rush
summary: Gemini Rush is a LAN racing game where each player controls a single-wheel vehicle on a circuit made up of two constantly parallel roads. The player has the ability to switch between the two using a skill. The vehicle is highly amenable and very fast.

name: Gentleman's Violence
summary: Gentleman's Violence is an innovative Gun-fu FPS inspired by modern action movies. Become a professional killer, unleashing the cinematic thrill of tactical gunplay and brutal hand-to-hand fighting.

name: Gearspark
summary: Gearspark thrusts you into a world of magick versus technology in this first-person RPG. Shoot, spell, and slice your way through randomized expeditions. Face skill checks, moral decisions and personal quests, shaping a world in turmoil.

name: Get Goating
summary: You’re a goat. You work at a post office. A storm scatters the mail across the PNW woods. Recover lost packages solo or with friends, navigate treacherous terrain, and avoid a roaming Sasquatch. Deliver fast, hide when needed, and don’t get caught.

name: Geobeast
summary: Test your geography skills with Geobeast! Find as many countries as you can in 12 minutes, master two unique game modes, and climb the global Steam leaderboard.

name: Gemblades
summary: A roguelite deckbuilder where you draft a deck of heroes called Gemblades and create satisfying synergies between them to save the world from the forces of Onyxion.

name: Get Clucked
summary: Run through chaotic roads! Dodge cars with up to 5 friends. Explore 12 levels, collect eggs, gems, and unlock over 20 hats to show off your style.

name: Genigods: Nezha
summary: Genigods: Nezha is an ARPG rooted in the chaos of ancient Chinese creation mythology. Play as Spirit Pearl, the first being forged by the Goddess of Creation Nüwa. Dive into iconic Chinese genesis tales, battle Colossal Gods, and experience the unique combat of Chinese-style celestial showdowns.
